title: Lead Technical Product Manager - Threat Protection-R-218826
description:
**Our Purpose**
 We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
   

  

****Title And Summary****
 Lead Technical Product Manager - Threat Protection
   

  

**About The Role:**
 Threat Protection is a suite of PaaS / cloud-based cyber security products providing:
   

  

* DDOS mitigation
* Web Application Firewall
* Bot Protection


 We combine unique threat intelligence with cutting edge data science and machine learning techniques to provide marketing leading security solutions. You can read more about the product at https://baffinbaynetworks.com/our-solutions
   

  

 Operating High-capacity Infrastructure From Data Centers Globally, The Product Provides Mission-critical Cyber Security For SMBs And Enterprises, Mitigating The Largest And Most Complicated DDOS Attacks And Application Layer Attacks. The Solution Offers Three Onboarding Methods:
   

  

* Layer 4 TCP / UDP proxy providing packet inspection and DDOS mitigation for all ports and protocols. Also available with BGP-based onboarding.
* Layer 7 / HTTP(S) reverse proxy for full HTTP inspection, providing application layer rate limiting, Web Application Firewall, bot protection and other application layer protections.


 We are seeking a strong Technical Product Manager to join our dynamic team, owning technical product strategy for the future evolution of Threat Protection and related products. You’ll work with colleagues around the world to help Mastercard position Threat Protection as a market-leading cybersecurity product.
   

  

 There may be a requirement for some limited travel.
   

  

**Experience:**
* Experience in one or more of the following areas: product management, solutions engineering, software engineering, network engineering, platform architecture.
* Strong understanding of how the internet works (including all layers of the OSI model) and comfortable talking about mainstream internet technologies and standards including DNS, HTTP, TLS, TCP / UDP, BGP.
* A broad grasp of internet security solutions and general cyber security best practices. Demonstrable interest in security and internet technologies.
* Some understanding of threat intelligence and how it can be used effectively in a security solution.
* Excellent written and verbal communicator, comfortable communicating with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Experienced at producing highly detailed internal technical documentation as well as customer-facing content.


**Responsibilities:**
* Work with Product Management colleagues to define and execute a technical product strategy.
* Write stories, product requirement documents and specifications.
* Collaborate with Engineering and Program Management teams, to drive an effective DevOps-based product development lifecycle.
* Collaborate with all stakeholders to prioritise workload and roadmap and ensure tasks are accurately defined, tracked, and executed.
* Collaborate with Engineering / Platform Operations to ensure the platform operates to market-leading resiliency and quality standards. Customers depend on the service operating effectively 24/7/365.
* Owns all product documentation, both internal and external facing. Ensuring that all aspects of the product development lifecycle and platform infrastructure are appropriately documented. Collaborate with the support team to produce and update customer support documentation.
* Carry out market research and competitive analyses to help shape product strategy.
* Collaborate with engineering, customer support and customer success teams to deal appropriately with service incidents, customer escalations and feature requests.
* Collaborate with sales, solutions engineering and marketing teams to produce appropriate customer-facing documentation and materials, and support the technical aspects of RFP responses when necessary.


**Corporate Security Responsibility**
 All Activities Involving Access To Mastercard Assets, Information, And Networks Comes With An Inherent Risk To The Organization And, Therefore, It Is Expected That Every Person Working For, Or On Behalf Of, Mastercard Is Responsible For Information Security And Must:
   

  

* Abide by Mastercard’s security policies and practices;
* Ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information being accessed;
* Report any suspected information security violation or breach, and
* Complete all periodic mandatory security trainings in accordance with Mastercard’s guidelines.


 R-218826

title: Automation Backbone Engineer
description:
- Pharmaceuticals - 12-Month Contract
   

  

 Our client is a global CDMO in pharmaceutical manufacturing providing process development and cGMP production in cell culture, microbial fermentation, and gene therapies.
   

  

 With continued organisational growth and a considerable amount of investment across the portfolio and capital programme.
   

  

 They have an extremely exciting opportunity for a Automation Backbone Engineer to form support a new large scale manufacturing facility being built in the UK.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Install and test new hardware including Servers, switches, and other IT/Automation server room rack components in both data centers and manufacturing area comm. rooms (IDF rooms).
* Install and test necessary application software on the new systems, including but not limited to DeltaV.
* Understanding of new HCI Infrastructure (VRTX would also be acceptable).
* Have an understand of DeltaV specific database setup and an understanding of how data flows work.
* Troubleshoot networking and configuration issues with the new installations.
* Develop and execute GMP test protocols pertaining to the DeltaV backbone systems.
* Configure necessary interfaces to other network applications on existing manufacturing networks.
* Support project commissioning through troubleshooting of network and instrumentation communications issues.


**Skills**
* 4+ yrs, minimum experience in Automation Engineering and/or IT systems installations and maintenance.
* Experience in IT systems hardware applications and server software (e.g., VMWare, HyperV, etc.).
* Understanding of manufacturing network architecture and applications.
* DeltaV software experience preferred.
* Knowledge of GxP regulatory framework.
* Experience in authoring and/or executing test protocols, GMP/Pharma experience strongly preferred.


**If this role is of interest to you, please apply now!**

title: (Senior) Sector Specialists (Engineer or Economist) – based in Luxembourg
description:
**This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence.** 
 The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

**The EIB, the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its Projects Directorate (PJ), Innovation and Competitiveness Department (INCO) Innovative Supply Chain & Process Industries Division (SCPI),** 
 at its headquarters in Luxembourg, (
 **Senior) Sector Specialists (Engineer or Economist)\*.**
* internal benchmark: (Senior) Sector Engineer or (Senior) Sector Economist


**These are full time positions at grade 5/6 for which the EIB offers a permanent\*\* contract.**
**The existence of these positions is linked to the Innovation Fund Partnership which is foreseen until 31st December 2031.**
***Panel interviews are anticipated for end of September.***
 Purpose
   

  

 Provide technical advisory services to projects, programmes and capacity building to project proponents within a wide range of technologically advanced sectors and assess, within multi-disciplinary teams, the technical viability and environmental sustainability of projects in accordance with the relevant EU requirements under the Innovation Fund Project Development Assistance (IF PDA).
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 You will report to the Head of Division of PJ/INCO/SCPI. As (Senior) Sector Engineer/Economist you will work closely with colleagues in the Innovation Fund Unit in PJ/ENERGY, PJ/INCO, other PJ Departments and other Bank directorates, to ensure that all duties are performed in line with the Contribution Agreement, and with FI on disbursement matters.
   

  

 You will need to work with a high degree of autonomy, maintaining contacts with the European Commission and the Climate, Innovation and Networks Executive Agency (CINEA) on Innovation Fund implementation and representing the EIB at high-level meetings and/or at external events.
   

  

 (\*\*)The Innovation Fund was set up under the revised EU Emissions Trading System (ETS) Directive. The objective of the Innovation Fund is to support the development and deployment of innovative low-carbon technologies and processes across energy intensive industries, renewable energy, energy storage, transport, buildings, carbon capture and use (CCU) or carbon capture and storage (CCS) (the “Innovation Fund Sectors”).
   

  

 More information on EIB involvement in IF is available at the dedicated IF PDA website: Innovation Fund – Project Development Assistance (eib.org)
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Review eligibility of projects for support under the IF PDA mandate and assess the feasibility and maturity of projects, in order to screen them in or out, for future PDA activities.
* Provide technical and economic assessment as well as advisory services to selected projects in line with the IF PDA mandate objectives and requirements.
* Prepare Terms of Reference for the procurement of consultant services and supervise the implementation of the services in the context of IF PDA mandate.
* Prepare high quality final PDA reports to be provided to the promoters, in line with the Contribution Agreement with the EC and the applicable procedures manual.
* Provide technical inputs to the reporting and monitoring on the achievements of the technical assistance delivered and to the preparation of the annual work programme of the IF PDA mandate.
* Propose improvements and updates of internal PDA procedures to increase the efficiency of the PDA activities.
* Contribute to any European Commission or European Court of Auditors audits of the IF PDA by providing information and implementing any audit action points.
* Track the evolution of the legal and regulatory framework related to the Innovation Fund and sectors covered under the Innovation Fund to ensure application of the most up to date requirements in the IF PDA.
* Represent the EIB for the Innovation Fund in workshops with Member States and Promoters or other events which may include sharing of good practice guides and methodologies.
* Undertake, as part of a multi-disciplinary team, the appraisal of the financial, economic, technical, and environmental viability of capital investment projects and programmes and the monitoring of EIB-financed projects in the Innovative Supply Chain and Process Industries sector, in line with EIB policies and procedures.
* Produce sector and policy papers and represent the EIB at sectorial events as required.


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in economics, business, finance, engineering, or a related field.
* Minimum 5 years of professional experience in Energy Intensive Industries (EII) or Cleantech manufacturing sectors (candidates with more senior experience would be highly preferred).
* Knowledge in one or more of the following areas
* Experience in one or more of the following areas
+ Providing technical support to projects related to Energy Intensive Industry and/or Cleantech manufacturing.
+ Procurement and management of technical support services for innovative projects related to Energy Intensive Industry and/or Cleantech manufacturing.
+ Developing client and stakeholder relationships, with industry representative bodies, EU institutions or government entities.

* Strong organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and evaluate complex technical issues.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams, draft clear and concise reports and present clearly in public.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Knowledge and experience in the use of standard IT tools.
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*\*), with a good knowledge of the other. (Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage)


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core competencies* 
 here
   

  

* The existence of this position is linked to the Innovation Fund Partnership which is foreseen until 31st December 2031. The Bank may terminate any employment contract in case the Innovation Fund Partnership ceases to exist.


*(\*\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We hire and value talent with unique characteristics, creating a work environment where they can be themselves. We believe that Diversity, Equity and Inclusion makes us a performing and innovative organisation. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

 We strongly invite applicants with a disability, neurodivergent profile or chronic condition to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation.
   

  

 Deadline for applications:
 **6th September 2024**

title: Vaktmästare
description:
Har du idéer för framtiden och drivs du av utmaningar? I Haninge får du utvecklas tillsammans med trygga kollegor som vill göra skillnad redan idag. Just nu pågår ett av de mest ambitiösa förändringsarbetena i vår kommuns historia. Vi bygger en ny stad, cirka 20 minuter från Söder. Följ med på vår resa.
   

  

**Tillsammans skapar vi framtiden för världen!**
 Vega skola & aktivitetshus öppnade i augusti 2023. Här arbetar kultur- och fritidsförvaltningen och utbildningsförvaltningens alla medarbetare i samverkan för att skapa möjligheter för alla åldrar att lära, upptäcka och mötas. Nu söker vi dig som tillsammans med oss vill skapa ett tryggt fungerande hus som ligger i framkant vad gäller verksamheter och upplevelser.
   

  

 Husets verksamheter består av grundskola, anpassad grundskola, skol- och folkbibliotek, öppen fritidsverksamhet, en fullstor idrottshall, ett rörelserum och kulturskoleverksamhet. Flera lokaler finns för att boka för privatpersoner, civilsamhället och näringsliv till möten, utbildningar, sammankomster och arrangemang av olika slag. Ett stort kulturrum finns tex. med möjlighet till såväl konsert, teater, bio, dans eller som konferenslokal.
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 I Vega skola & aktivitetshus arbetar fyra vaktmästare tillsammans. För vaktmästeriets alla tjänster gäller det att ha god digital mognad och hög IT kompetens. Alla husets vaktmästare har i sitt grunduppdrag allmän service av lokaler, möblering, lås-nyckel och passerkortshantering liksom andra frågor som behöver vaktmästarhjälp. Arbetet är mycket varierande. Vi lägger stor vikt på personliga egenskaper som social kompetens och förmåga att självständigt och tillsammans med kollegor och verksamheter planera och utföra de uppdrag som behöver tas om hand. Du arbetar mot skolans personal och elever, kultur- och fritidsförvaltningens medarbetare, föreningslivet och husets alla besökare. Du får uppdrag av både skolans administrativa chef och platschefen som också är din chef. Du arbetar på schema, kvälls och helgtjänstgöring ingår. Körkort är ett krav.
   

  

**Din kompetens**
 Du har mycket god kompetens gällande teknik- och IT stöd, samt fastighetsskötsel.
   

  

 Både skolan och aktivitetshuset har modern teknik i alla rum. Vi ser gärna att du har kompetens i lokalbokningssystem. Du trivs med att hjälpa verksamheter, elever, personal och föreningslivet när tekniken krånglar eller när man inte vet hur man ska göra. Vaktmästarrollen kräver ett stort aktivt egenansvar för arbetsuppgifter. Du tar initiativ och sätter igång aktiviteter. Du tar hand om felanmälningar, ronder, tillsyn och beställningar från verksamheterna samt fastighetsunderhåll. Som person är du social, nyfiken och trivs ihop med andra, du är van att möta dem som är för dig olik och van i att arbeta i arbetslag. Du bör ha vaktmästarerfarenhet från större arbetsplats med en mångfald av verksamheter alternativt större skola.
   

  

 Vega skola & aktivitetshus är ett stort hus med många rum och tre våningar på 14000 kvm. För att trivas med uppdraget behöver du gilla att röra på dig och även klara tunga lyft i samband med till exempel leveranser.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder** 
**dig**
 Vi erbjuder ett spännande och meningsfullt arbete i en förvaltning som befinner sig i ett utvecklingsskede, och du är med och driver utvecklingen. Kultur och fritidsförvaltningen ansvarar för husets serviceavdelning i vilken vaktmästartjänsterna ingår. Din närmaste chef är husets platschef och organisatoriskt ingår du i avdelningen Ung fritid på kultur och fritidsförvaltningen. Tjänsten är 100% semestertjänst.
   

  

 Vega skola och aktivitetshus är i nuläget öppet mellan 8.00- 22.00 vardagar och 8.00-17:00-18:00 under helger. Ditt individuella schema planeras tillsammans med platschefen och kommer att variera beroende på de aktiviteter som sker i huset.
   

  

 Vi har fri tillgång till gym i kommunhuset, friskvårdscheckar, klämdagar samt möjlighet till semesterväxling.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

*I den här rekryteringen har vi redan gjort våra val av annonskanaler och samarbetspartners. Vi undanber oss vänligt men bestämt all form av hjälp med rekryteringen från utomstående aktörer.*
 Haninge kommun ser mångfald som en styrka och välkomnar alla sökande. Vår kompetensbaserade rekryteringsmetodik syftar till att fokusera på individens kompetens och därigenom även motverka diskriminering.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Haninge | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/370 | Kontakt: Anette Pettersson 08-6067000, Soner Birlik 08-0607000, | Facklig företrädare: Fackliga företrädare kontaktas via växeln 08-6067000, | Publicerat: 2024-08-05 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-26

title: Butiksmedarbetare, team kolonial/e-handel, Willys Huddinge Länna
description:
*Vi är alla olika. Och det är härligt! Vi anställer inte människor efter en viss mall utan efter vem du är. För oss är driv och personlighet viktigare än erfarenhet och bakgrund. Det går bra för oss, och vi växer så det knakar. Nu söker vi fler glada medarbetare med rätt inställning och vilja att utvecklas!*
**Om jobbet**
**Tjänsten avser** 
 : Tillsvidareanställning på 32 timmar i veckan, provanställning tillämpas
   

  

**Tillträde** 
 : Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Arbetstider** 
 : Du kommer att variera mellan att arbeta tidig morgon, dagtid, kvällar och helger
   

  

**Krav** 
 : Gymnasial utbildning, goda kunskaper i svenska (tal och skrift). Vi välkomnar sökande i alla åldrar, men med anledning av Arbetsmiljölagen ska du ha fyllt 18 år
   

  

 Vi söker dig som vill bli en del av vårt härliga gäng på Willys Huddinge Länna! Tjänsten innebär kort och gott att du, tillsammans med dina kollegor, bidrar till att erbjuda våra kunder bra och hållbar mat till riktigt bra priser. Du är en viktig del av butiksteamet som ser till att ge våra kunder den bästa butiksupplevelsen. Här kommer lite mer om tjänsten:
   

  

* Tillsammans med dina kollegor sköter du den omväxlande dagliga driften på kolonialavdelningen. Du kan räkna med att få många steg på stegräknaren!
* Du jobbar med plock, pack och utlämning av e-handelsvaror.
* Du packar upp varor och ser till att våra hyllor är välfyllda och ser fina ut.
* Du ser till att det är rent och snyggt i butiken.
* Du hjälper våra kunder till rätta och möter dem med kunskap, fingertoppskänsla och ett stort leende.
* Du tar aktivt del i beställningar och säljplanering och bidrar till att butiken når sina försäljnings- och lönsamhetsmål.
* Du hjälper våra kunder i kassan eller något av våra andra utcheckningsalternativ.


**Om oss**
 Det är inte alla som passar att jobba hos oss. Men många tycker att det är kul! För oss är rätt inställning och vilja att utvecklas viktigare än erfarenhet och utbildning. Hos oss får du jobba ihop med ett helt team av sköna personligheter med olika bakgrunder, kunskaper och perspektiv.
   

  

 Lite mer om oss kommer här:
   

  

* Vi är ansluta till Handelsanställdas kollektivavtal där schyssta villkor som pension, försäkringar och bra OB-ersättning ingår.
* Du får friskvårdsbidrag, personalrabatt och personalerbjudanden efter en tids anställning.
* Hållbarhet är viktigt för oss och vi arbetar till exempel alltid med att minska matsvinn i och utanför våra butiker.
* Vi ger dig bra möjligheter att växa genom olika ansvarsområden och utbildningar. Många som börjat sin resa som butiksmedarbetare på Willys är idag teamchefer, butikschefer eller har en specialistroll på vårt kontor.
* Du får erfarenheter – om t ex försäljning, service och om att driva butik – som du kommer att ha nytta av oavsett vad du väljer att göra längre fram.
* Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss här.


**Om dig**
 Du gillar mat, människor och försäljning lika mycket som vi! För oss spelar det ingen roll om du är vegan eller köttfantast, äter tacos en fredag eller en tisdag. Det fina med dig är att du är du. Och det är just det vi letar efter.
   

  

* Du vill lära dig nya saker och utvecklas.
* Du har positiv inställning och vill ha roligt på jobbet.
* Du ser när något behöver göras, kavlar upp ärmarna och får det gjort.
* Du har lätt för att samarbeta med andra – hos oss jobbar vi tillsammans som ett lag!
* Du har god IT- och datorvana, är noggrann och har inga problem att navigera i olika system.
* Det är en fördel om du har jobbat i butik eller med service, men det är inte ett krav.
* Du pratar, skriver och förstår svenska. Många av våra kunder talar fler språk än det, så om du gör detsamma är det toppen!


 Om du vill veta mer om vad tjänsten innebär, kontakta Mats Björk, mats.bjork@willys.se. Vi ser gärna att du vid intresse skickar din ansökan så snart som möjligt, då tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag den 2024-08-19. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via våra jobbsidor.
   

  

*För att ta reda på om just du är den vi söker så innehåller vår rekryteringsprocess både tester och intervjuer.*
*Vi gör även bakgrundskontroll vid samtliga rekryteringar. Läs mer:* 
 Så går det till när du söker jobb inom Axfood
   

  

 Observera att vi inte under denna process kommer be dig logga in med ditt Bank-id, uppge något lösenord eller scanna någon QR-kod. Vid frågor kontakta Medarbetarsupporten på jobb@axfood.se.

title: HR/Learning & Development Specialist
description:
**Job Title:** 
 HR/Learning & Development Specialist
 



**Location:** 
 Stäket Järfalla, Sweden
 



**Working pattern:** 
 Full-time, from the office in Stäket.
 



**Languages:** 
 Native / fluent Swedish plus professional English as it is the working language of the company. Any other Nordic language or NL/DE would be a bonus
 



**Company:** 
 PCB Connect
 



**About Us:** 
 PCB Connect is a leading international sales company specializing in Printed Circuit Boards, with 17 global locations including Europe, the USA, Brazil, China, and the Philippines. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products and exceptional service to our diverse clientele. As we continue to grow, we are seeking a dynamic and dedicated HR/Learning & Development Specialist to join our team in Stockholm.
 



**Job Summary:** 
 We are looking for an HR/Learning & Development Specialist to enhance our HR functions and spearhead our learning and development initiatives. This role is crucial in fostering a culture of continuous improvement and ensuring our team members reach their full potential.
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Develop and implement HR strategies and policies that align with our business objectives.
* Manage the full employee lifecycle, including recruitment, onboarding, performance management, and offboarding.
* Design, develop, and deliver innovative learning and development programs tailored to meet the needs of our global workforce.
* Conduct training sessions, workshops, and seminars to enhance employee skills and knowledge.
* Collaborate with department heads to identify training needs and create individualized development plans.
* Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of training programs and make recommendations for improvements.
* Foster a positive and inclusive workplace culture that promotes employee engagement and retention.
* Ensure compliance with local labor laws and regulations.
* Provide guidance and support to managers and employees on HR-related issues.
* Maintain accurate HR records and generate regular reports on HR metrics.
* Utilize a modern Human Resources Information System (HRIS) to streamline HR processes and improve data management.
* Analyze HRIS data to identify trends and inform strategic HR decisions.



**Qualifications:** 



* Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
* Proven experience as an HR Specialist or in a similar role, with a focus on learning and development.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to design and deliver effective training programs.
* Proficiency in using modern HRIS platforms and other HR software tools.
* Analytical and problem-solving abilities.
* High level of integrity and confidentiality.



**What We Offer:** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunities for professional growth and development.
* A collaborative and supportive work environment.
* The chance to be part of a forward-thinking company with a global presence.



**Company Overview:** 




 We are an SME with our HQ based in Sweden and ambitious global plans. PCB Connect has become one of the leading suppliers of printed circuit boards since its establishment in Stockholm in 2004. We adapt to changing needs, and find and present solutions, not limitations. Your needs - our solution. PCB Connect is organized as a corporate group, PCB Connect Holding AB and 13 other companies spread over 17 different countries, employing around 130 people with a turnover of around 53m USD.
 



  





**Job Applicant Privacy Notice** 
 https://www.pcbconnectgroup.com/careers/

title: Projektledare
description:
**Vi söker nu efter flera Projektledare till vår kund inom offentlig sektor.** 




  





**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Ansvara för att projektet/uppdraget levererar enligt plan.
* Ansvara för att planera, organisera, leda och bevaka aktiviteterna i projektet/uppdraget.
* Ta fram tidsplan, kvalitet- och ekonomiska ramar för projekt/uppdrag och se till att de hålls.
* Ta fram beslutsunderlag som behövs för projektets framdrift.
* Ta fram och presentera projektuppdateringar för identifierade intressenter.
* Förändringsledningsaktiviteter kopplade till uppdraget/projektet.
* Bedriva stöd och utvecklingsarbete inom projektstyrning.
* Mer information om uppdraget förmedlas om man går vidare i urvalet.



  





**Skallkrav:** 




  





 Minst fem års dokumenterad erfarenhet av att:
 


* driva verksamhetsutvecklingsprojekt med en mix av verksamhets- och IT-fokus
* arbeta med projektstyrningsmodellen PPS eller liknande modell
* arbeta med varierande uppdrag och projekt, både i samtida antal och komplexitet
* skapa och leda tvärfunktionella team i dynamisk och föränderlig miljö
* planera och driva workshops



  





 Du ska kunna visa exempel på:
 


* framgångsrikt samarbete inom och kommunikation med olika intressenter samt exempelvis projektgrupp och andra grupper.
* förmåga att analysera och hantera komplexa situationer.stark problemlösningsförmåga och beslutsamhet i osäkra situationer.
* stark ledarskapsförmåga med en inkluderande och inspirerande ledarstil.
* förmåga att motivera team och skapa en positiv arbetsmiljö..
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i både tal och skrift.



  





**Placeringsort:** 
 Sundbyberg
 



**Omfattning:** 
 Heltid på plats i kundens lokaler.
 



**Start:** 
 Oktober 2024, väldigt långsiktigt uppdrag.
 



  





**Information:** 



* ***Säkerhetsprövning och registerkontroll utförs på kundens begäran.***
* ***Ansök senast 2024-08-08***
* ***Urval av kandidater sker löpande och annonsen kan tas bort tidigare.***



  





**Om Agiremus** 




 Sedan 2015 har vi hjälpt flertalet medarbetare att komma ut på arbetsmarknaden samt att nå sina karriärmål runtom i Sverige. Genom att skapa och bibehålla meningsfulla relationer med våra samarbetspartners kan vi presentera en bred rad av arbetsmarknadens mest attraktiva karriärmöjligheter för våra medarbetare och kandidater. Agiremus verkar inom de flesta branscherna, både inom privat och offentlig sektor.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder:
 



 Agiremus erbjuder dig som konsult en spännande och utmanande arbetsplats där du ges möjlighet att utvecklas inom din roll. Vi bryr oss om dig som och strävar efter långsiktiga samarbeten. Som konsult hos oss ges du, förutom spännande uppdrag, möjlighet att dela din resa med andra konsulter. Med jämna mellanrum anordnar vi tillfällen för er att träffas genom olika aktiviteter. Självklart kommer du även att ha en engagerad kontaktperson hos oss som finns där som bollplank och stöd. Vi erbjuder dig även goda personalförmåner som:
 



  




* Anställning med fast månadslön.
* Semester enligt semesterlagen.
* Tjänstepension.
* Heltäckande sjuk och olycksfallsförsäkring dygnet runt, årets alla dagar.
* Friskvårdsbidrag m.m.



  





 Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Business Operations Associate
description:
Are you passionate about delivering exceptional customer experience to entrepreneurs? We are hiring for a committed
 **Business Operations Associate** 
 to join our dynamic team!
 



  





**About Froda** 




 Froda was founded in 2015 with a clear mission – to democratize the access to financing and provide small businesses the same opportunities to grow as large ones. Through digital processes and technological innovation, we have shortened the loan process from months to minutes, making it easy for business owners to invest in their ideas.
 



  





**About the role** 




 In this role, you will be the first point of contact for our customers, essential in providing high-quality support and contributing to their overall satisfaction. Your talent for understanding customer needs, coupled with your problem-solving skills, will not only resolve their issues but also enrich their experience with Froda.
 



  





**You will** 



* Deliver exceptional customer service via email, and phone.
* Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve customer issues efficiently.
* Provide product and service information, highlighting features beneficial to customers.
* Collaborate with other teams to ensure a consistent and high-quality customer experience.
* Collect and report customer feedback to aid in enhancing our services.



  





**Who you are** 



* You possess excellent communication skills in both English and Swedish.
* Experience in customer service, support, or a similar role is preferred.
* You have an empathetic approach to handling customer queries and complaints.
* Able to multitask and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment.
* You are tech-savvy and comfortable navigating customer support platforms and tools.



  





**What’s in it for you?** 




 Working at Froda is everything you can expect from working at a tech scale: fun and fast-paced. We are 80+ ambitious people who work together mostly at the office, with few scheduled meetings. The culture is friendly, with a get-shit-done attitude. At Froda, you will truly have freedom under responsibility. This means that you will have the ability to impact your own work and tackle a wider set of tasks.
 



  





 Furthermore, you’ll get:
 


* Fun & exciting work environment in a fast-growing and profitable scale-up
* Competitive compensation package
* Insurance and pension plan
* The possibility to work in our awesome office in Stockholm
* Friendly culture that values work/life balance
* Monthly after-works that are actually fun



  





 If you're passionate about delivering unparalleled customer service and want to be part of our mission to redefine the banking experience for entrepreneurs, apply to join us as a Business Operations Associate today!

title: Projektkoordinator till forskningsinfrastrukturen Clinical Genomics (Vikariat)
description:
**Vill du vara med och bidra till arbetet inom precisionsmedicin i den molekylära diagnostikens frontlinje?**
 Vi söker en projektkoordinator (vikariat) för att stärka upp vårt team. Detta är en spännande möjlighet för dig som vill bidra till precisionsmedicin och det finns goda möjligheter att utforma tjänsten utifrån dina kompetenser och intresseområden. Vi erbjuder en fartfylld, labbnära miljö där du arbetar interdisciplinärt med molekylärbiologer, biomedicinare, bioinformatiker, systemutvecklare, IT experter och forskare i nära samarbetare med diagnostiska experter inom hälso- och sjukvården.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Institutionen för mikrobiologi, tumör- och cellbiologi (MTC) vid Karolinska Institutet bedriver forskning och undervisning inom immunologi, infektionsbiologi, cellbiologi och cancer. MTC har cirka 40 forskargrupper och våra nyckelord är multidisciplinära, överbryggande, nationella och internationella samarbeten
   

  

 Avdelningen
 *Clinical Genomics* 
 vid MTC är en nationell forskningsinfrastruktur vid Science for Life Laboratory (SciLifeLab). Vårt uppdrag är att bidra till implementeringen av precisionsdiagnostik och precisionsmedicin i Sverige. Tillsammans med forskare och vårdgivare i Sverige utför vi avancerade genomikanalyser (storskalig DNA-sekvensering) och jobbar aktivt med att vidareutveckla testerna. Syftet är att säkerställa att det finns en möjlighet till världsledande forskning och att diagnostiken i Sverige ligger i internationell framkant.
   

  

 Vårt team består av ca 45 medarbetare med bred kompetens inom genomik, bioinformatik, mjukvaruutveckling, IT och kvalitetssäkring. Vi har ett modernt laboratorium med hög grad av automatisering och stor sekvenseringskapacitet, och vi är kontinuerligt involverade i ett stort antal projekt. De bioinformatiska analysflöden och den programvara vi utvecklar är med öppen källkod, läs mer här. Hos oss erbjuds du en spännande arbetsmiljö, med utmanande arbetsuppgifter och hög teamkänsla. Vi arbetar tillsammans för att uppnå teamets gemensamma mål: att genom avancerade genomikanalyser öka förståelsen av sjukdomsmekanismer och att genom vården bidra till att förbättra människors liv.
   

  

 Du hittar mer information om oss på vår hemsida.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Vi söker dig som har ett brinnande intresse för projektkoordinering, för att arbeta med avancerade genomikanalyser inom området precisionsmedicin. Tjänsten är ett vikariat på 12 månader med eventuell möjlighet till förlängning.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna består bland annat av följande:
   

  

* Koordinering och uppföljning av kundprojekt, inklusive uppstartsmöten
* Ansvara för interna projektbeskrivningar av inkommande kundprojekt
* Kundsupport för analysbeställningar, provkrav, uppdateringar av analysstatus, frågor inför nya projekt
* Utveckling och förbättringsarbete av strategin för projektkoordinering
* Ansvara för att hålla informationen på hemsidan uppdaterad
* Administrativa uppgifter i samband med nya kundkonton
* Ansvara för årlig enkät för feedback till alla kunder
* Uppdatera intern och extern dokumentation angående kundinteraktion
* Förbereda underlag till fakturering


**Vem är du?**
 Den här rollen kräver en ansvarskännande och driftig person med positiv attityd. Du är vårt ansikte utåt och representerar oss i ett stort antal möten. Det är viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i team och att du som person bidrar till interna och externa samarbeten. Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet, där arbete i team är högt prioriterat.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har examen inom life science (molekylärbiologi, bioteknik, biomedicin eller motsvarande ämnesområde). Du som söker bör ha följande kompetenser:
   

  

* God förståelse för molekylärbiologiska metoder inklusive storskalig DNA sekvensering
* Mycket god förmåga att kommunicera både internt och externt
* Stort intresse för kundkommunikation och kundsupport, stark servicekänsla
* Mycket goda kunskaper i engelska och svenska i både tal och skrift


**Vad erbjuder vi?**
 En kreativ, internationell och inspirerande miljö fylld av kompetens och nyfikenhet. Karolinska Institutet är ett av världens ledande medicinska universitet. Vår vision är att driva utvecklingen av kunskap om livet och verka för en bättre hälsa för alla. Här bedriver vi framgångsrik medicinsk forskning och har det största utbudet av medicinska utbildningar i Sverige. Som universitet är Karolinska Institutet en statlig myndighet. Det gör att du får goda förmåner genom vårt kollektivavtal. Medarbetare på KI erbjuds också möjlighet till ett flexibelt arbetssätt. Det innebär att om den verksamhet du jobbar i tillåter, så kan du arbeta en del av din arbetstid på distans. Du får även träna fritt i våra moderna friskvårdsanläggningar där utbildad personal finns på plats.
   

  

**Placering:** 
 Solna
   

  

 Tio skäl att välja Karolinska Institutet
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan senast den 18 augusti.
   

  

 Ansökan ska göras via rekryteringssystemet Varbi. I denna rekrytering söker du med ditt CV utan personligt brev. I ansökningsformuläret kommer du istället att få svara på några frågor om varför du söker jobbet.
   

  

**Vill du göra skillnad – och bidra till en bättre hälsa för alla? Sök jobb hos oss**
 Anställningsform: tidsbegränsad anställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 % | Ort: Solna | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: STÖD 2-3045/2024 | Kontakt: Valtteri Wirta valtteri.wirta@scilifelab.se, | Facklig företrädare: Taher Darreh-Shori, SACO taher.darreh-shori@ki.se, Carina Eklund, OFR carina.eklund@ki.se, Henry Wölling, SEKO henry.wolling@ki.se, | Publicerat: 2024-08-05 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-18

title: Senior Executive Assistant (FTC)
description:
**Craft:**
 HR & Business Support
   

  

**Job Description:**
 We are seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Executive Assistant (Level 10) to join our team and support a C-level executive and their Leadership Team. The ideal candidate will be adept at managing multiple executives simultaneously. This role requires exceptional organizational skills and proactivity, attention to detail, and the ability to handle sensitive information with utmost confidentiality.
   

  

 EA Team Vision: To elevate the craft of the King EA and deliver creative and impactful executive support, priding ourselves on being first-rate collaborators across the Kingdom. We go above and beyond!
   

  

 EA Team Mission: Our mission is to build and maintain strong internal and external relationships, ensuring exceptional service and a positive image of King and our team. We prioritize the Executive's time and well-being, manage the flow of information efficiently, and proactively support initiatives to ensure smooth daily operations. We act with professionalism, tact, and confidentiality in all interactions. Additionally, we dedicate time to honing our skills and keeping them updated to continuously improve our support.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities within the Function Team:
   

  

* Collaborate closely with C-level Executives, prioritizing, managing, tracking, and providing regular updates on tasks.
* Efficiently manage calendar(s) with attention to priorities, ensuring strategic optimization of time.
* Manage domestic and international travel arrangements.
* Purchase recognition gifts in line with company policy and budget as agreed with the Executive.
* Create, update, and manage distribution lists for the Function Team.
* Planning and coordinating logistics for events, functions, lunches, dinners, and conferences and also collaborating with the Event Team as needed.
* Perform the duties of a Purchasing Specialist (i.e., raise and receipt POs) for the cost centers of the Function Team.
* Supporting the onboarding of new hires, ensuring they have the required access, and scheduling meet & greets.
* Manage or actively contribute to projects within the Function Team.
* Prepare and submit Concur expense reports as requested.
* Serve as the proxy Executive in approving Concur Expense reports, POs in Oracle, and invoices in MarkView when needed.
* Prepare agenda, take minutes, and track actions at Leadership Team meetings as needed.
* Draft and review communications, presentations, and documents.


  
   

  

 Key Responsibilities within the EA Team:
   

  

* Contribute to EA recruitment and onboard newly hired EAs.
* Own and develop key areas for EA team improvement (Operations/Talent/Culture).
* Optimize EA work processes and develop tools for EA work processes.
* Plan and execute skills, career and team development initiatives for the EA team.
* Drive and support EA team engagement.
* Draft and review communications, presentations, and documents.
* Coach and mentor other EAs.


 Qualifications:
   

  

* Proven experience as an Executive Assistant to a C-level Executive, preferably in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
* Exceptional proactivity and organizational skills.
* Strong attention to detail and problem-solving abilities.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to handle sensitive information with discretion and maintain confidentiality.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and other relevant software.


**About King**
 At King, we're Making the World Playful. Heard of Candy Crush? We're the creators behind it. With game studios in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona and Berlin, and offices in Dublin, San Francisco, New York, and Malta, we have a 20-year history of delivering some of the world's most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry and are on a mission to level-up the little moments for our more than 200 million active monthly users. But we aren't just crushing it with candies, we're also behind Farm Heroes, Bubble Witch, Pet Rescue and loads of other sweet games. As a leading interactive entertainment company for the mobile world, King is part of Activision Blizzard, which was acquired by Microsoft.
   

  

**A Great Saga Needs All Sorts of Heroes**
 King strives to be a place where everyone can be their most authentic self. We recognize that diversity, equity and inclusion is a vital and continuous conversation, and that change only happens when we all come together. It’s our mission to build a diverse and inclusive Kingdom for our people, players, and community.
   

  

**Making the World Playful**
 Making the World Playful is our mission – it’s the thread that connects our people, our players, and our passion for our games. Let’s face it, who doesn’t love a bit of fun?
   

  

 Kingsters are seriously playful: creative thinkers who balance art and science to bring moments of magic to millions daily. But our players aren’t the only ones that can level-up. We’re always looking for ways to champion each other and make what’s already great, even better.
   

  

 So, if this feels like a fun way to spend your days, and you share our passion, our values, and our hunger to shape the future, join us in Making the World Playful.
   

  

 Applications need to be in English.
   

  

 Discover King at careers.king.com

title: Konsultuppdrag | Senior Project Manager within Cloud
description:
**Beskrivning:** 




 Senior Project Manager within Cloud.
   

  

 "Do you want to play a central role in our exciting and transformational journey to become the most data driven bank in the world?"
 **Profile/Role:** 
 Project Manager
 **Expected years of experience:** 
 9+ years
 **Utilization:** 
 100%
 **Start date:** 
 2024-10-01
 **End date:** 
 2025-12-19
 **Location/remote availability:** 
 5 days onsite in the beginning
   

  





  





**Role/A** 
**ssignment Overview**
 Join our clients team as a Project Manager for CIR (Cloud Infrastructure Readiness), where you will lead the coordination of the development of technical capabilities, platforms, and processes within  IT.
 



 CIR coordinates multiple IT domains to implement technical capabilities, platforms, and processes to support application development and cloud operations. The role involves enabling the Multi-Cloud Strategy and building core functionalities for our client´s cloud environments. CIR also coordinates the development and delivery of essential tools and expertise for integrating various SaaS solutions into  infrastructure. Additionally, CIR develops and delivers training, procedures, and operational models to ensure effective governance, maintenance, and service delivery. This comprehensive approach ensures the efficient consumption and management of  managed cloud services.
   





 You will be working with multiple tribes and teams responsible for delivering common solutions for a cloud environment. The overall target is divided into several capability areas where different sub-streams are responsible to drive the progress. Some teams and tribes are mature, while others are just taking their first steps towards the goal.
   

 Your responsibilities will include driving the program as a project manager, ensuring tight collaboration with sub-stream drivers, the parent Cloud Transformation Initiative program management, and foremost with our stakeholders. 
 



  





 This includes:
   





**Create and Maintain Project Plan:**




 • Facilitate collaboration and lead the Substream Leaders:
   

 - Overall Activities: Document and monitor structural and supportive activities.
   

 - Clear Progression: Ensure a clear transition from disorganization to structure and progress.
   

 - Distributed Ownership: Clarify responsibilities for deliverables and follow-up.
   





 • Facilitate collaboration and lead the Substream Leaders
   

 - Close Collaboration: Establish a productive collaboration and facilitate progress and alignment within streams, tribes, and teams.
   

 - Timelines: Prevent delays through proactive engagement with substream leaders and steering committee.
   

 - Ensure progress and delivery through  agile way of working.
   





 • Manage Meetings and Communication:
   

 - Constructive Meetings: Foster a positive and productive meeting environment that is efficient.
   

 - Clear Communication: Prevent confusion and frustration by presenting clear messages and structured materials.
   

 - Status Reporting: Report progress, challenges, and resource conflicts in a timely manner with proactive suggestions for solutions.
   





 •Roadmaps and Deliverables:
   

 - Clear Roadmaps: Compile roadmaps that show upcoming and completed deliverables.
   

 - Purpose built overview: Ensure roadmaps suited to match our stakeholders need as well as  delivery teams’ way of working.
   

 - Highlight Challenges: Document and communicate any potential challenges.
   





 • Structure and Overview of Use-Cases:
   

 - Timelines and Requirements: Create an overview of use-cases, their timelines, and requirements.
   

 - Follow-Up: Implement a structured follow-up on use-cases and their progress.
   





**Requirements** 
 :
   

 -  expect you to have the seniority, drive, and structure to navigate your way independently to ensure progress and success for this essential part of Cloud Journey.
   

 - Proven skill to drive major programs from conceptual level to successful implementation.
   

 - Handle both high level management and technical development teams including managing conflict of interests.
   

 - Ability to package and present complex matters to make it understandable and realizable.
   

 - Highly structured and able to set robust structures that simplify overview, collaboration, and support progress towards the goal.
   

 - Change leadership skills and experience in working with agile development methods.
   

 - Competence and experience of working with traditional infrastructural IT and Cloud based IT, preferably Cloud transformation.
   

 - Experience in the banking sector or worked within regulatory enterprises and compliance governance.
   

 - Experience in working in larger enterprises.
   

 Personal trades
   

 - Driven leader, while also make others deliver.
   

 - Transformative leadership.
   

 - Open and including attitude towards stakeholders and team members.
   

 - Comfortable to handle complex matters in a transforming setting where traditional IT is questioned.
   

 - independent, initiative-taking and easily creates an overall picture of what is important.
   

  

**Language Skills:**
 You are fluent in Swedish and English
 



  





**Om oss** 




**Senterprise Consulting är ett eget affärsområde inom Senterprise Sverige och är en ledande oberoende förmedlare av frilansande konsulter.
   

 Genom aktiv headhunting och search och en omfattande teknisk förståelse hjälper Senterprise Sverige de främsta arbetsgivarna att hitta de mest lämpade kandidaterna för både anställning och konsultbehov.**
*Läs vidare på* 
*www.senterprise.se*

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
At Optimizely, we're on a mission to help people unlock their digital potential. We do that by reinventing how marketing and product teams work to create and optimize digital experiences across all channels. With Optimizely One, our industry-first operating system for marketers, we offer teams flexibility and choice to build their stack their way with our fully SaaS, fully decoupled, and highly composable solution.
   

  

 We are proud to help more than 10,000 businesses, including H&M, PayPal, Zoom, and Toyota, enrich their customer lifetime value, increase revenue and grow their brands. Our innovation and excellence have earned us numerous recognitions as a leader by industry analysts such as Gartner, Forrester, and IDC, reinforcing our role as a trailblazer in MarTech.
   

  

 At our core, we believe work is about more than just numbers -- it's about the people. Our culture is dynamic and constantly evolving, shaped by every employee, their actions and their stories. With over 1500 Optimizers spread across 12 global locations, our diverse team embodies the "One Optimizely" spirit, emphasizing collaboration and continuous improvement, while fostering a culture where every voice is heard and valued.
   

  

**Introduction**
 We are looking for a Stockholm-based Senior Software Engineer for our Commerce team, to help us shape the future experiences of Optimizely’s e-commerce offerings.
   

  

 Ideally you bring experience of building APIs and services. You are self-motivated and like to collaborate with your colleagues to find the best solution that solves the problem, considering architecture, cost of development and cost of ownership. You are comfortable with working in a fast-moving agile environment and working closely with User Experience Designers, Product Managers, and other stakeholders.
   

  

 You will be collaborating with developers distributed across the world. Proficiency in written and spoken English is a strong requirement.
   

  

**As a Senior Software Engineer, You Will..**
* Design, architect and implement simple, secure, scalable, maintainable, and cost-effective software solutions.
* Ensure product quality by developing and applying thorough automated testing techniques.
* Contribute to architecture and design discussions within your agile team as well as across teams and products.
* Contribute to project planning including requirements elicitation, design, task grooming and scoping.
* Mentor and share with other engineers and team members.
* Pursue growth by maintaining an awareness of the state of technology, engineering techniques, and best practices.


**About You**
* You have at least a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar, or corresponding level of relevant education
* You have 7+ years of experience working professionally with modern development practices.
* You are strong in software design and engineering concepts, including but not limited to object-oriented analysis, design, and programming.
* You are approaching expert level knowledge of the .NET development platform.
* You are knowledgeable in the development and operational aspects of cloud-based software.
* You are highly proficient in spoken and written English.
* You are a team player who enjoys solving problems together, and a great communicator.
* You have an understanding and interest for building and maintaining large applications as well as extensible libraries/frameworks/APIs.
* Ideally you have significant experience designing and building large, modular, applications with continuous releases that quickly adapt to user needs.


**Education**
 Bachelor’s Degree (Computer Science or engineering preferred) or equivalent work experience
   

  

 Optimizely is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Optimizely is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

title: Senior Backend Developer (Python)
description:
**Senior Backend Developer – Stockholm, Hybrid** 




 Are you passionate about building innovative backend solutions for the energy sector in a consultancy environment? Want to play a key role in developing cutting-edge applications for a diverse client base, where you'll tackle complex data optimisation challenges and create impactful products with a focus on robust backend systems?
 



  





**What's in it for you?** 




 You'll join a dynamic team of software engineers and data scientists, specialising in custom product development for the energy industry. Your role will primarily focus on backend development, allowing you to dive deep into complex systems and data infrastructure.
 



  





 Enjoy a flexible hybrid work model, balancing time between client offices, your company's headquarters in Stockholm, and remote work. This varied approach allows you to immerse yourself in client environments, collaborate closely with your team, and maintain productivity from home when needed. You'll engage in projects of various scales, collaborating with cross-functional teams and interfacing directly with clients to deliver tailored solutions.
 



  





 You'll get a competitive salary offering up to 70,000 SEK per month (depending on your experience). They are committed to professional growth, with plans to offer clear paths to leadership roles as the company expands. With ambitious growth plans, there's potential for advancement to senior technical positions in the future. On top of this you’ll get 30 days vacation, a health and wellness allowance (friskvård) and private pension contribution.
 



  





**What you'd be doing?** 




 You'll typically work in agile teams of 5-6 people, sometimes scaling up for larger projects. You might spearhead new initiatives, assessing client needs and building your team from within the company.
 



  





 Your work will involve developing sophisticated data infrastructure, implementing machine learning components, and creating robust APIs. You'll use a modern tech stack including cloud services, containerisation, and message brokers. Key technologies you'll work with include Python, Django, FastAPI, Kubernetes, Airflow, PostgreSQL, TimescaleDB, Kafka, and RabbitMQ.
 



  





 You'll be responsible for designing and implementing scalable backend systems, optimising performance, and ensuring data integrity and security.
 



  





  





**About you?** 




 You have at least 4 years of experience in backend development, with a strong focus on Python and frameworks such as Django and FastAPI. You're passionate about clean, efficient code and stay current with emerging technologies. Adaptability is key, as you'll work across various domains and tech stacks.
 



  





 You’d have experience with DevOps practices (like Kubernetes, Docker, Git), cloud platforms (like AWS/Azure), and familiarity with data processing and machine learning tools. Leadership experience and strong communication skills would also be good here, as you'll be able to mentor team members and interface with clients whilst contributing to the evolution of backend development practices within the team.
 



  





 Consultant-style experience is beneficial, as client interaction is a significant part of the role and fluency in both Swedish and English is a must for effective client communication.
 



  





**A bit about them?** 




 A growing tech consultancy in Stockholm, specialising in software solutions for the energy sector. They partner with both established industry leaders and innovative startups, focusing on data-driven applications that promote sustainability.
 



  





 The company culture emphasises collaboration, continuous learning, and making a positive impact in the green tech space. They're seeking motivated individuals who can drive technical discussions and align with their mission to create meaningful solutions in the energy sector.
 



  





 With a current team of about 45 and plans for significant growth, this role offers an exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of energy tech innovation in a rapidly expanding organization.
 



  





  





*Don't worry if your CV isn't up to date - just send me a message on LinkedIn or an email over to will@zebrapeople.com and we can go from there.* 




  





  





*3 stage Interview Process* 



1. *Initial Chat*
2. *Technical Discussion*
3. *Final with CEO*

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**About Kambi**
 Kambi Group plc is a leading B2B provider of premium sports betting services to licensed gaming operators. Our services provide an end-to-end solution for operators wanting to launch a standalone Sportsbook or bolster their existing offering with an innovative sports betting product. From front-end user interface to customer intelligence, risk management and odds compiling, all built on our in-house developed software, we strive to deliver the ultimate service and solution to our partners.
   

  

 Our vision is to create the world’s leading sports betting experiences, together with our partners.
   

  

**About Tzeract:**
 Tzeract is a pioneering sports betting AI pricing company, operating as an agile startup within the larger ecosystem of Kambi Group ( https://kambi.com/ ). Our mission is to revolutionize the sports betting industry by leveraging cutting-edge technology and advanced analytics to enable the next generation of sports betting experiences. With a focus on both historical and real-time sports data, we're building systems that outperform the market and deliver value to our users.
   

  

 To know more about us - https://tzeract.com/
   

  

**Role Overview:**
 We're seeking a seasoned
 **Senior Software Engineer** 
 with expertise in Python, AWS, and microservices architecture, experienced in developing high-transaction systems. This role is vital for leading the design and development of our technology stack, ensuring our systems can handle the scale and speed required by our operations. You'll collaborate with a cross-functional team to build resilient, efficient, and secure solutions that support our data-driven decision-making processes.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable and resilient microservices using Python and AWS technologies.
* Deep understanding and experience of Rust or Go is a plus.
* Lead initiatives to architect high-transaction systems capable of managing the volume and velocity of our data.
* Implement best practices in software engineering, including CI/CD, containerization, and automated testing to ensure quality and speed of deployments.
* Collaborate with data engineers and scientists to integrate AI models and algorithms into production systems efficiently.
* Mentor junior engineers, fostering a culture of technical excellence and innovation.
* Stay ahead of the curve on new technologies, methodologies, and industry trends, applying them to improve our systems and processes.


**Qualifications:**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* 5+ years of software development experience, with a strong background in Python.
* Proven track record of developing and maintaining high-transaction, scalable systems.
* Extensive experience with AWS services and managing cloud-based infrastructure.
* Solid understanding of microservices architecture and container orchestration tools (e.g., Kubernetes).
* Experience with DevOps tools and practices, including Docker, Jenkins, or similar.
* Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to lead projects and collaborate effectively across teams.
* Passion for sports and sports betting is a plus.


**Why Join Us:**
* Lead cutting-edge projects that are shaping the future of the sports betting industry.
* Work within a fast-paced, innovative environment that values your ideas and encourages growth.
* Competitive compensation package, including stock options, comprehensive health benefits, and flexible work arrangements.
* A culture that is passionate about technology, innovation, and sports.


**How to Apply:**
 Submit your resume, a brief cover letter outlining your experience with high-transaction systems and why you're interested in this role, and any relevant code samples or project links to us.
   

  

 We're excited to see how you can contribute to our team's success!
   

  

 #wearekambi
   

  

**Kambi's ongoing commitment to Diversity and Inclusion in the workplace**
 If you require any reasonable adjustment during the recruitment process, please notify your recruiter, who will assist you however they can. Diversity and inclusion is at the heart of who we are and who we aim to be. While we are proud of the positive and inclusive company culture we have created, we know we can do so much more. Kambi constantly evolves its Diversity and Inclusion strategy to ensure it becomes an even more inclusive and positive place to work, with the core management team reaffirming its commitment to delivering on employee feedback.
   

  

**Creating an inclusive environment**
 We believe Kambi's greatest strength is the collective talent of our employees. Kambi is committed to ensuring we create an inclusive work environment where everyone can feel valued, thrive and achieve their potential, regardless of who they are or what their background is. We know that it is only by having a balance of different voices, values and opinions that Kambi is able to be the market leader it is today.
   

  

 #wearekambi

title: Lead Snowflake Data Engineer
description:
**Assignment description**

 ﻿
 



**Scope:** 



* Lead development in building out a new data solution in Snowflake to support Recoveries & Loss business processes on Snowflake within AWS environment
* Lead efforts to integrate and curate data from multiple sources into a consolidated data mart on Snowflake

 Data warehousing design
 



 CI/CD for ETL pipelines in Snowflake

 Data Warehousing
 



 Snowflake
