title: Cloud API Engineer
description:
**We are looking for a Cloud API Engineer for our client, who is also an experienced API Gateway Engineer to design, implement, and manage APIs within our organization. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of API management platforms, preferably AWS API Gateway, and a solid foundation in API development. You will be responsible for ensuring the efficient and effective delivery of API-based services, collaborating closely with development and operations teams.**


### **Responsibilities**


* Design and implement APIs using API management platforms (AWS API Gateway preferred).
* Create and maintain comprehensive API documentation.
* Integrate APIs with backend systems and services.
* Monitor API performance and troubleshoot issues.
* Collaborate with development and operations teams to ensure API alignment with business requirements.
* Implement security best practices for API protection.
* Stay up-to-date with API management trends and technologies.

  


**Required Skills**


* Strong understanding of API management concepts and platforms (AWS API Gateway preferred). ✓ Experience in API development and design.
* Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash, etc.) for automation.
* Proficiency in Java, Node.js, and React.js.
* Experience with AWS services like CloudFront, S3, SQS, DynamoDB, AWS Lambda functions and AWS networking components.
* Experience with API security standards and protocols (OAuth, OpenID Connect).
* Knowledge of API testing and performance benchmarking tools.
* Proficiency in terraform for infrastructure as code.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

  


**Desired Skills**


* Understanding of cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Agile ways of working, DevSecOps.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions).

title: Senior Project Manager within Cloud
description:
**Start****30-09-2024****Duration****10-12 months**
  
We are nonw looking for a Project manager within Cloud. The position is i Stockholm and requiers 3 days a week at the costumers office minimum.


Start 2024-10-01


End 2025-12-31

**Role/Assignment Overview**  

As a Project Manager for CIR (Cloud Infrastructure Readiness), where you will lead the coordination of the development of technical capabilities, platforms, and processes the costumers IT. CIR coordinates multiple IT domains to implement technical capabilities, platforms, and processes to support application development and cloud operations. The role involves enabling the Multi-Cloud Strategy and building core functionalities for costumers's cloud environments. CIR also coordinates the development and delivery of essential tools and expertise for integrating various SaaS solutions into costumers's infrastructure. Additionally, CIR develops and delivers training, procedures, and operational models to ensure effective governance, maintenance, and service delivery. This comprehensive approach ensures the efficient consumption and management of costumers's managed cloud services.


You will be working with multiple tribes and teams responsible for delivering common solutions for a cloud environment. The overall target is divided into several capability areas where different sub-streams are responsible to drive the progress. Some teams and tribes are mature, while others are just taking their first steps towards the goal.  

Your responsibilities will include driving the program as a project manager, ensuring tight collaboration with sub-stream drivers, the parent Cloud Transformation Initiative program management, and foremost with our stakeholders. This includes:

**Create and Maintain Project Plan:**

* Facilitate collaboration and lead the Substream Leaders:


Overall Activities: Document and monitor structural and supportive activities.
Clear Progression: Ensure a clear transition from disorganization to structure and progress.  

Distributed Ownership: Clarify responsibilities for deliverables and follow-up.

* Facilitate collaboration and lead the Substream Leaders


Close Collaboration: Establish a productive collaboration and facilitate progress and alignment within streams, tribes, and teams.  

Timelines: Prevent delays through proactive engagement with substream leaders and steering committee.  

Ensure progress and delivery through SEB’s agile way of working.* Manage Meetings and Communication:


Constructive Meetings: Foster a positive and productive meeting environment that is efficient.  

Clear Communication: Prevent confusion and frustration by presenting clear messages and structured materials.  

Status Reporting: Report progress, challenges, and resource conflicts in a timely manner with proactive suggestions for solutions.* Roadmaps and Deliverables:


Clear Roadmaps: Compile roadmaps that show upcoming and completed deliverables.  

Purpose built overview: Ensure roadmaps suited to match our stakeholders need as well as SEBs delivery teams’ way of working.  

Highlight Challenges: Document and communicate any potential challenges.* Structure and Overview of Use-Cases:
* Timelines and Requirements: Create an overview of use-cases, their timelines, and requirements.
* Follow-Up: Implement a structured follow-up on use-cases and their progress.

* **Requirements**:  


	+ SEB expect you to have the seniority, drive, and structure to navigate your way independently to ensure progress and success for this essential part of SEB's Cloud Journey.
	+ Proven skill to drive major programs from conceptual level to successful implementation.
	+ Handle both high level management and technical development teams including managing conflict of interests.
	+ Ability to package and present complex matters to make it understandable and realizable.
	+ Highly structured and able to set robust structures that simplify overview, collaboration, and support progress towards the goal.
	+ Change leadership skills and experience in working with agile development methods.
	+ Competence and experience of working with traditional infrastructural IT and Cloud based IT, preferably Cloud transformation.
	+ Experience in the banking sector or worked within regulatory enterprises and compliance governance.
	+ Experience in working in larger enterprises.
Personal trades  


	+ Driven leader, while also make others deliver.
	+ Transformative leadership.
	+ Open and including attitude towards stakeholders and team members.
	+ Comfortable to handle complex matters in a transforming setting where traditional IT is questioned.
	+ independent, initiative-taking and easily creates an overall picture of what is important.  

**Language Skills:**  

You are fluent in Swedish and English


Please send your CV and a motivation.

title: Kommunikatör
description:
Habilitering & Hälsa erbjuder specialiserad vård och stöd till personer som har en varaktig funktionsnedsättning; som nedsatt förmåga att kommunicera, se, höra eller röra sig. Målet är att bibehålla och utveckla funktionsförmågan, skapa förutsättningar för en god hälsa och möjlighet att aktivt delta i samhället. Vill du göra skillnad för personer som har en funktionsnedsättning? Välkommen till Habilitering & Hälsa, en del av Västra Götalandsregionen. Tillsammans har vi kraft att förändra.


Är du bra på att kommunicera komplexa frågor på ett enkelt vis? Vi söker dig som är intresserad av framtidens hälso- och sjukvård för personer med varaktiga funktionsnedsättningar.

**Ditt uppdrag**


Du ger operativt och strategiskt kommunikationsstöd åt ett av Habilitering & Hälsas verksamhetsområden, och deltar i verksamhetens ledningsgrupp. I arbetsuppgifterna ingår att planera, genomföra och utvärdera kommunikationsinsatser som att skriva artiklar för olika kanaler, skriva manus för och spela in rörlig media, formulera och målgruppsanpassa budskap. Resultatet blir begripligt och lättillgängligt för olika målgrupper.


Utöver att vi jobbar med varsitt verksamhetsområde har vi särskilda ansvarsområden där vi stöttar varandra. Det är därför önskvärt om du har kompetens inom foto och film, och vana av att skapa innehåll till digitala kanaler.


Som en del av arbetsgruppen förväntas du bidra till kontinuerlig utveckling av kommunikationsarbetet och arbetsprocesser.


Habilitering & Hälsas målgrupper är personer med varaktiga funktionsnedsättningar, det kan handla om nedsatt hörsel, syn och kognitiv förmåga. Det ställer höga krav på att patientinformation är tillgänglig och lätt att ta till sig.

**Kvalifikationer**


Vi välkomnar dig som har relevant högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom medie- och kommunikationsvetenskap, journalistik eller motsvarande och flerårig erfarenhet av att arbeta med strategisk kommunikation. För att trivas i tjänsten har du förmåga att se till både helheten och delarna, och är strukturerad i ditt arbetssätt. Du förväntas kunna driva ditt arbete framåt själv men har alltid stöd av kollegor.


Förutom att arbeta nära dina kommunikatörskollegor har du flera olika samarbetspartners inom organisationen. Du har förmåga att samarbeta med många olika kontaktytor, kan prioritera och ta beslut för verksamhetens bästa. Vi tror att du är en öppen person som vill utvecklas, och kan bidra till andras utveckling.


Vi söker dig som:

* Har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i såväl tal som skrift, och är en god skribent
* Har god kunskap om tillgänglighet och klarspråk
* Har erfarenhet av foto och filmproduktion, inklusive bildhantering och filmredigering
* Har erfarenhet av att jobba strategiskt med digitalt innehåll i olika kanaler
* Har kunskap inom Adobe Creative Cloud, särskilt InDesign, Photoshop och Premiere eller Rush.


Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av arbete i politisk styrd verksamhet.


Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet.


Är det dig vi söker? Vi ser fram emot att läsa din ansökan. Om du blir utvald till intervju vill vi se exempel på arbetsprover.

**Organisation**


Habilitering & Hälsa är en del av Västra Götalandsregionen (VGR). VGR är mitt i en omställning till en mer god och nära vård som utgår från individuella förutsättningar och behov samt bidrar till jämlik hälsa, trygghet och självständighet. Kommunikation är en förutsättning för att genomföra den förändringen.


Som kommunikatör är du en del av utvecklingsfunktionen på Habilitering & Hälsa och rapporterar till utvecklingschefen.


Kommunikationsfunktionen ansvarar för intern, lednings- och extern kommunikation, intern och extern webb, sociala medier, press- och mediarelationer, kriskommunikation, varumärkesarbete, film och foto, grafisk produktion samt projektkommunikation.


Om Västra GötalandsregionenVästra Götalandsregionen finns till för människorna i Västra Götaland. Vi ser till att det finns god hälso- och sjukvård för alla. Vi arbetar för en hållbar utveckling och tillväxt, bra miljö, förbättrad folkhälsa, ett rikt kulturliv och goda kommunikationer i hela Västra Götaland.Västra Götalandsregionen arbetar aktivt för att digitalisera fler arbetssätt. För att vara en del av den digitala omvandlingen har du med dig grundläggande färdigheter och kan använda digitala verktyg och tjänster. Du kan söka information, kommunicera, interagera digitalt, är riskmedveten och har motivation att delta i utvecklingen för att lära nytt.Västra Götalandsregionen krigsplacerar alla tillsvidareanställda medarbetare. Vill du veta mer om Västra Götalandsregionen kan du besöka vår introduktion till nya medarbetare på länken www.vgregion,se/introduktion. Du kan även läsa mer i presentation om Lön, ersättning och förmåner – det här får du som medarbetare i VGR. AnsökanVästra Götalandsregionen ser helst att du registrerar din ansökan via rekryteringssystemet. Om du som sökande har frågor om den utannonserade tjänsten eller av särskilda och speciella skäl inte kan registrera dina uppgifter i ett offentligt system - kontakta kontaktperson för respektive annons. Till bemannings-, förmedlings- och rekryteringsföretag och till dig som är försäljare:Vi undanber oss vänligen men bestämt direktkontakt med bemannings-, förmedlings- och rekryteringsföretag samt andra externa aktörer och försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser. Västra Götalandsregionen har upphandlade avtal.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 % | Ort: Göteborg | Län: Västra Götalands län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/3542 | Kontakt: Elin Granfors elin.granfors@vgregion.se, | Facklig företrädare: Stellan Solgård, Vision stellan.solgard@vgregion.se, Johan Lennartsson, Saco johan.lennartsson@vgregion.se, | Publicerat: 2024-08-05 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-30

title: Integration Architect
description:
Alfa Laval in Lund is looking for an Integration Architect
About Us
Every day, we get opportunities to make a positive impact – on our colleagues, partners, customers, and society. Together, we’re pioneering the solutions of the future and unlocking the full potential of precious resources. Trusted to act on initiative, we challenge conventional thinking to develop world leading technologies that inspire progress in vital areas, including energy, food, water and shipping. As we push forward, the innovative, open spirit that fuels our 140-year-old start-up culture and rapid growth also drives our personal growth. So, as we shape a more resourceful, less wasteful world, we build careers too.
About the job
The integration team provides IT solutions for all information exchange between applications within Alfa Laval or between Alfa Laval and external parties. We have started a transition moving to more API and cloud-based solutions which you will be a part of.
As integration architect you will provide solution architecture for information exchange between applications within Alfa Laval or between Alfa Laval and external parties. The position is also vital in the activity to define the future Alfa Laval integration target architecture.
You will participate in architecture forums and take decisions regarding technical solutions in accordance with the reference architecture for integration. You will also act as an advisor to information requestors when discussing external or internal integration possibilities.
As a part of the job, you will also keep yourself updated with new technology and emerging trends in the field of integration.
Who are you?
We are looking for a colleague to expand our integration team. You have a great interest for integration and a passion to break down complex integration challenges into simple design and solutions that can be maintained efficiently.
What you know
To succeed in this role, you have an interest in Computer Science. It is fundamental that you are interested in understanding the challenges related to integration and how to overcome them by bringing in new ideas and having an open mindset.
General knowledge* Experience in leading in technical roles
* Understanding and experience from the integration domain.
* Hands-on experience working as a developer.
* Ability to translate business requirements into a solution design, configuration and build as well as determine estimates of effort.


Good to know:* Knowledge of integration standards.
* Experience of C#.
* Experience of the Azure platform.
* Experience in Azure Integration Services.
* Experience of working in agile environments.


What’s in it for you?
We offer a challenging position in an open and friendly environment where we help each other to develop and create value. You will be able to explore the latest and greatest within the platforms we use and work with verry skilled and professional colleagues. Your work will have a true impact on Alfa Laval’s future success!
For more information, please contact
Silvester Napik, Manager, Enterprise Integration +46 462891819
Tanja Sukaj, Talent Acquisition Partner, tanja.sukaj@alfalaval.com
For union information, please contact:  

 Johan Ranhög, Akademikerna, +46 46 2891664  

 Stefan Sandell, Ledarna, +46 46 367364  

 Bror Garcia Lantz, Unionen, +46 709 366985
We are reviewing applications continuously, make sure to send in yours no later than 31st of August 2024. Please note that this recruitment may take longer due to summer vacations.
Due to GDPR we do not accept applications sent directly via email.
company_description: Alfa Laval is a leading global supplier of products and solutions for heat transfer, separation and fluid handling through our key products – heat exchangers, separators, pumps and valves.

title: Microsoft Windows AD/Entra ID Technician \u007C SEB, Solna
description:
Be an important part of SEB's ever advancing IT-area as an Microsoft Windows AD/Entra ID Technician by future proofing the digital architecture!  

SEB is one of the leading financial services groups and at the same time one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. We welcome you to a bank and environment characterized by entrepreneurship and innovation! As an Microsoft Windows AD/Entra ID Technician, you contribute to our future way of working by developing and building our Active Directory infrastructure to new heights. If you wish to make a great impact for customers and colleagues, welcome to us in the AD infrastructure team!  

What you will be doing
In your role as Microsoft Windows AD/Entra ID Technician, you will work close with other technicians to develop and support the initiatives in SEB. This means working in an enterprise environment, building, and maintaining the on-premises platform as well as being heavily involved in the AD transformation. We are a highly prioritized and important area for the success of SEB which means we continuously expand our knowledge, and through our shared passion and expertise, we influence and make an impact as we progress in our and SEB's journey.  

Some of the technologies and aspects we work with are Identity, Active Directory, Access Management, PKI, ADFS, Entra AD, MFA, Azure & Office & Windows ATP. But we are not satisfied with using the same technologies day in and day out, we search for and try everything that can be useful in a modern cutting-edge platform.  

Your team
You will be part of the AD-team. There are six technicians in the AD-team, working closely with the groups Solution Architect, Product Owner and Scrum Master. We also work close with other internal and external contacts of SEB, on a regional and international level. The work is carried out following the SAFe-framework and our group is characterized by collaboration, openness, and strength in our differences.  

We sit in modern offices next to the Mall of Scandinavia, Solna. There are restaurants, a state-of-the-art company gym and the opportunity to participate in group training sessions every week here.  

Who we are looking for?
We believe you are a person with a high curiosity and willingness to learn new thing to develop yourself, both as a person and technically as well. Further, you enjoy working together with colleagues and are comfortable sharing your own views and give feedback to advance the area. You are comfortable with large contact areas, and you communicate with clarity, thus creating trust in your expertise.  

Your technical knowledge lies within Microsoft Infrastructure (cloud and on prem), where you have been working with Entra AD architecture and connected components in larger enterprises. You have extended knowledge about different protocols. Knowledge of scripting in PowerShell or other scripts is advantageous as well as the experience of working with virtualization. You have probably also worked with PAW, MFS, ADFS or PKI. Lastly, you are fluent in written and spoken Swedish and English.  

What we offer
We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Work-life balance
* International opportunities and working environment
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
* Innovative company in forefront of technology
* Challenging, cutting-edge work
* Opportunities to help transform an industry


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.  

Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2024-09-01. If you have questions about the position, please contact Agnes Kemper at agnes.kemper@seb.se **Learn more about working at SEB** www.sebgroup.com/career
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Receptionist Scandic Grand Central
description:
**Scandic Grand Central är ett nav för kultur i Stockholm!**



Med konstutställningar, konserter och en egen teater är det alltid något som händer innanför de anrika väggarna. Vi som arbetar på hotellet trivs i den fartfyllda och kreativa miljön och har en gemensam vilja att erbjuda våra gäster det lilla extra.


En mix av det historiska och det moderna beläget mitt i Stockholms hjärta. För dig som uppskattar en internationell och inspirerande social scen som andas musik och kultur. Om du kunde sätta ett stetoskop på Stockholms kropp skulle hjärtljuden slå högst där Scandic Grand Central är. Så vart slår dina hjärtljud? Älskar du musik, konst och kreativa miljöer lika mycket som oss? Då är du den vi söker!


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Grand Central.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Utöver hotellets reception kommer du även att ha hand om konferensens reception vid behov vilket ger en spännande och rolig utveckling på fler delar inom hotellet. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid. Vi tillämpar provanställning om 6 månader. Din närmsta chef kommer att vara vår Assisterade Front Office and Meeting Manager. Startdatum så snart som möjligt.  

  

Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_addresses:
Scandic Hotels Deutschland GmbH
Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

\*\*Välkommen till Scandic Continental, hotellet med det absolut bästa läget mitt i Stockholms stadskärna!\*\* Vare sig du välkomnar gäster till ett av våra 392 hotellrum eller till vår takbar med spektakulär utsikt över Riddarfjärden så kommer du konstant möta besökare från hela världen. title: Senior Product Manager, Grafana AI/ML (Remote, Sweden)
description:
**This is a remote position and we're considering candidates in Sweden only.**



As a Product Manager at Grafana Labs, you'll develop a vision and strategy for your product domain. You will own your product’s roadmap, collateral, and market research, and you will collaborate with Grafana leadership on fine-tuning your product’s goals. You will be the primary advocate and expert in your area, with a strong ability to communicate needs, functionality, and details effectively both to external customers and internal stakeholders. The teams and people you will be interacting with will be 100% remote and globally distributed, so strong and proactive communication is essential.



Product Managers are the bridge that connect Engineering, Design, and Product Design to Go-To-Market. You are a facilitator who ensures the free flow of information across these teams and are expected to be technically proficient when representing our products to our customers.


**The Role**
------------



As the Product Manager for AI, you’ll be involved with everything related to our AI offerings, including driving the roadmap of our Sift, Forecasting, Outlier and the LLM plugin features. You’ll also work across Grafana’s R&D org to promote AI, help shape AI enhanced workflows and partner directly with other product team’s to deliver these features. You will develop a deep understanding of how to apply AI technologies to address customer challenges in observability. And more broadly you’ll help define a vision of how Grafana Labs can leverage AI to solve our customers problems and grow our revenue.



General responsibilities as a Product Manager at Grafana Labs, include:


* Transform ideas and feedback into a product vision and roadmap
* Empathize with customer problems in order to collect user needs, requirements, and pain points
* Curate and properly represent user feedback to Engineering, while providing evidence to support tradeoffs and priorities
* Work closely with Product Marketing to explain our tracing platform’s unique differentiation to Go-To-Market teams, creating documentation, blog posts, website content, datasheets, and whitepapers.
* Use your deep product expertise to make decisions about our go-to-market strategies, pricing, packaging, licensing, and tiering.

**We’re excited about you because you have:**
---------------------------------------------


* A BSBA/BA in Computer Science, a related field, or equivalent work experience
* 3+ years of experience in Product Management
* 3+ years of experience working on a B2B SaaS product
* Experience with AI, ML and GenAI in particular
* A desire to dive into complex solutions and work with a highly technical product and customers
* Experience partnering with Product Design to build delightful user experiences
* Experience working with engineering teams to design and build products in a fast-paced environment
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills

### **Bonus Points**


* Experience operating or using Grafana Labs open source projects, including Grafana Tempo, Grafana Loki, Grafana Mimir, or Grafana itself.
* Experience with OpenTelemetry
* Experience building observability/monitoring tools and/or developer tools more generally
* Experience with open source software and/or commercial open source companies
* Experience with products offered both via SaaS and self-managed


In Sweden, the Base compensation range for this role is SEK 738,518 - SEK 886,222. Actual compensation may vary based on level, experience, and skillset as assessed in the interview process. Benefits include equity, bonus (if applicable) and other benefits listed here.


* *Compensation ranges are country-specific. If you are applying for this role from a different location than listed above, your recruiter will discuss your specific market’s defined pay range & benefits at the beginning of the process.*

  

**About Grafana Labs:** There are more than 20M users of Grafana, the open source visualization tool, around the globe, monitoring everything from beehives to climate change in the Alps. The instantly recognizable dashboards have been spotted everywhere from a NASA launch and Minecraft HQ to Wimbledon and the Tour de France. Grafana Labs also helps more than 3,000 companies - including Bloomberg, JPMorgan Chase, and eBay - manage their observability strategies with the Grafana LGTM Stack, which can be run fully managed with Grafana Cloud or self-managed with the Grafana Enterprise Stack, both featuring scalable metrics (Grafana Mimir), logs (Grafana Loki), and traces (Grafana Tempo).

**Benefits:** For more information about the perks and benefits of working at Grafana, please check out our careers page.

**Equal Opportunity Employer:** At Grafana Labs we’re building a company where a diverse mix of talented people want to come, stay, and do their best work. We know that our company runs on the hard work and the dedication of our passionate and creative employees. If you're excited about this role but your experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyways.

We will recruit, train, compensate and promote regardless of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, disability, age, veteran status, and all the other fascinating characteristics that make us different and unique. We believe that equality and diversity builds a strong organization and we’re working hard to make sure that’s the foundation of our organization as we grow.

*For information about how your personal data is used once you’ve applied to a job, check out our* *privacy policy**.*
company_description: Grafana Labs is the company behind Grafana, the leading open source software for visualizing time series data.

title: Psykologer för digitala konsultationer parterapi
description:
Var med och skapa framtidens digitala hälsotjänster!
  
Som det första företaget i Norge lanserade Eyr videokonsultering via mobil år 2016, och sedan dess har vi levererat högkvalitativa och säkra digitala hälsotjänster till över 300 000 patienter i Sverige, Norge och Danmark. Hos Eyr värnar vi om att vården ska bli bättre och mer tillgänglig för alla. Vi har utvecklat en plattform som förenklar kommunikationen mellan patient och läkare både före, under och efter konsultationen. Att arbeta som psykolog hos oss innebär banbrytande arbete både på teknisk och medicinsk nivå, där vi främjar innovation inom trygga ramar. Som konsult hos Eyr får du erfarenhet av framtidens e-hälsolösningar. Vi är ett växande företag och genom att ansluta dig nu har du möjlighet att påverka företagets framtid.
  
Jobba när och var du vill
  
Som konsultpsykolog med eget företag har du möjlighet att välja var du vill arbeta, hemifrån, på stugan eller till och med utomlands.
  
Arbetet på Eyr är flexibelt och kan lätt kombineras med andra tjänster. Vi tillhandahåller ett cloud-based journalsystem.
  
Lite om dig
  
Du är entusiastisk inför att arbeta med digitala hälsotjänster och ser positivt på teknisk innovation inom hälsan. Du har professionell integritet, är trygg i din yrkesutövning och har god kommunikationsförmåga. Du är serviceinriktad, lösningsorienterad och strävar efter att ge patienterna en bra upplevelse.
  
Vi söker legitimerade psykologer i Sverige, samt minst två års erfarenhet som psykolog med parterapi. Det är en fördel om du även har dansk eller norsk psykologlegitimation och erfarenhet, samt att du behärskar antingen norska och svenska eller danska och svenska väl.
  
Var med och påverka framtidens sjukvård!
  
**Jobbtyp:** Deltid
  
**Förväntad arbetstid:** 1–5 timmar per vecka
  
  

**Benefits:**  

Jobba hemifrån
  
  

**Schedule:**  

Dag
  
Kväll
  
Måndag till fredag
  
  

**Arbetsort:** Distans
  
**Sista ansökningsdatum:** 2024-08-14
  
**Förväntat startdatum:** 2024-08-19
  
Öppen för alla
  
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

title: Operations Manager for CarmentaAutomotive
description:
About CarmentaAutomotive
  
  

CarmentaAutomotive works with cloud technology for the automotive industry. Their cloud-based software improves traffic flow, creates more efficient and environmentally friendly driving, and aims to reduce road accidents. Their product enables vehicles to better understand their surroundings. The goal and ambition of this team of 12 are to provide 'situational awareness' and optimize vehicle accessibility.
  
  

About the Position
  
Together with our partner CarmentaAutomotive, we are looking for an Operations Manager to join their team in central Gothenburg. In this role, you will work on a variety of tasks that are necessary for the company to operate smoothly. You will contribute to sales, marketing, finance, and project activities, and handle daily office administration too, such as picking up mail and arranging Friday treats. You will be the central ‘go-to-person’ for our team for administrative topics and our suppliers (office, IT, communication, bookkeeping, etc.). You will support the management and prepare financial reports, check invoices, monitor budgets, and, also communicate with customers as needed.
  
  

**Your main responsibilities will include:**  

* Handling invoices and payments
* Managing purchases
* Associated administration
* Maintaining office organization and related office tasks
* Contribute to reporting, preparing management documentations
* Supporting the team
* Contributing to the development and improvement of processes and routines
* Participating in management meetings


We are looking for someone who
  
* Is an allrounder and a doer eager to take care of tasks that arise
* Creative, perseverant and striving for development
* Has a higher education degree, preferably in HR, economics, or management
* Communicates fluently in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.
* Has 3-5 years of experience, preferably in a similar broad role.
* Enjoys diverse tasks.


To succeed in this role, you should be unpretentious and enjoy varied tasks. As a person, you are independent, structured, and committed to ensuring that your work maintains high quality.
  
  

About the Employment
  
This is a direct hiring assignment. Be quick with your application as we are conducting ongoing selection of candidates, and the advertisement may close before the position is filled if we move to the selection and interview phase.
  
  

**Additional Information:**  

* Scope: Full-time, at CarmentaAutomotive office in central Gothenburg.
* Start: immediate start
* Location: Gothenburg (Near Nordstan)
* Salary: Fixed monthly salary
* Contact persons: Caroline Finlöf, caroline.finlof@oio.se


About OIO
  
Our passion is to help you find the right role and workplace. We are also aware that you are discerning and choose carefully before your next career step, as we would too. Therefore, we work dedicatedly in the recruitment process to get to know you and your ambitions. We believe that people in the right place have a greater chance of reaching their full potential. Through fair and uncomplicated employment terms and present leadership, we actively work on your engagement and development. In this way, we strive to become an obvious career partner for you. We are as picky as you are.

title: Hotellreceptionist- Extrajobb 2024
description:
Nu söker vi receptionister med start omgående för extrajobb!
  
Receptionister till Scandic Värnamo!
  
Vare sig du välkomnar gäster till ett av våra 121 hotellrum eller till våra 7 konferenslokaler så kommer du konstant möta besökare från hela världen. Till Scandic Värnamo kommer våra gäster bland annat för att bo, lobbyjobba, njuta av en AW eller för att uppleva en oförglömlig middag i Proseccobaren eller Sinatrabaren. Hos oss kommer du att arbeta med kollegor som vet vad det lilla extra för gästen innebär och tillsammans skapa de bästa gästupplevelserna.
  
Vill du ta chansen att bli en i teamet hos oss? Trivs du i en miljö med högt tempo och drivs av att hitta lösningar då är det dig vi letar efter!
  
Du ska älska mötet med gästen och har förmågan att snabbt skapa goda relationer. Du tar initiativ, är flexibel för förändringar och har en god förmåga att se lösningar. Du kan hantera stressiga situationer och samtidigt prioritera rätt saker. Att kunna arbeta bra i team och vara en omtänksam kollega ser vi som en självklarhet.
  
  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter är bland annat följande:**  

Checka in och ut gäster i vårt system Opera Cloud.
  
Koordinera alla avdelningar för att möta våra gästers önskemål.
  
Svara på frågor från våra gäster.
  
Bidra till merförsäljning.
  
  

**Information om tjänsten:**  

Det här är en anställning för enstaka dagar på extra vid behov under helger/kvällar lovperioder. Arbetet är förlagt till både dag- och kvällstid samt även helger. Vi håller intervjuer löpande så skicka din ansökan redan idag. Du bör vara över 18 år.

title: Front-end Engineer for Portfolio Brands
description:
**Job Description**  

Join our innovative team in portfolio brands where we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional online shopping experiences as we are looking for **Frontend developer**.


We are on a journey to implement latest innovative solutions, offering seamless navigation, personalized recommendations, and an immersive browsing experience. We leverage advanced technologies to ensure a fast, secure, and user-friendly interface, allowing customers to explore our curated collections effortlessly. Our commitment to excellence drives us to continuously enhance our digital storefront and ensuring that our customers experience an exceptional online shopping journey.


As a frontend engineer at Portfolio brands in H&M group, you will be part of a cross functional product team working alongside other developers, designers and brand teams.

**In this role, your responsibility will be**

* Develop and maintain high-quality responsive web applications.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, backend developers, and product managers to deliver seamless user experiences.
* Participate in code reviews, and contribute to a culture of continuous improvement.
* Identify areas of improvement, sharing knowledge and collective growth.
* Stay up to date with the latest frontend development trends, tools, and best practices, and share knowledge with the team.
* Contribute to architechtural decisions and technical roadmap planning.
* Troubleshoot and resolve frontend issues, bugs, and performance bottlenecks.
* Write clean, well-documented code and ensure proper version control using Git or other version control systems.
* Work closely with stakeholders from all parts of the organization to develop the technical aspects of prioritized business projects.
* Ensure engineering excellence through customer centricity, rigorous testing, innovative solutions, and adherence to best practices in software development.
* Work-in and follow Agile methodologies.
* Learn, grow, be challenged, and have fun!

  

**Qualifications**  

We are looking for a proactive and passionate frontend engineer who thrives in a growing environment. You have a strong technical background and are excited about taking ownership. You are self-driven, enjoy tackling challenges, and are always eager to learn and grow.

* At least 3 years experience working as a software engineer with a frontend focus.
* Extensive experience in frontend development, particularly with **React, Nextjs and Typescript.**
* Strong understanding of modern frontend architectures and best practices.
* Proficiency in frontend build tools and package managers such as Webpack, Babel, or npm.
* Interest and keen to learn new tech skills.
* Collaborate with backend, data, analytics and designer teams to create seamless user experiences.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen eye for detail.
* Working in CMS tool is desired.
* Knowledge in tailwind is an advantage.
* Good to have knowledge in Nodejs.
* Staying updated on emerging technology trends like API strategy, event-driven architecture, and cloud computing to contribute effectively to evolving technology strategies.
* Fluency in English as it is the working language at H&M Group.


As a person, you are friendly, curious, and eager to learn every day. Join us at H&M, where we prioritise having fun at work while driving success together!

 **Additional Information** **Location:** Liljeholmen, Stockholm. As our team works onsite, we prefer candidates to be available in and around work location for better collaboration.

**What we offer!**  

We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.  

  

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment types and countries.*  

  

**Inclusion & Diversity**  

Portfolio Brands are part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.


We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.

**Company Description:**  

H&M Group is a family of brands; H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, and Afound. At H&M Group, our people are the driving force behind our commitment to creating meaningful growth and more sustainable lifestyles. Help us re-imagine fashion and together we will re-shape our industry. Learn more about H&M Group here.

title: Vikarierande Kulturprojektledare, administratör och tekniskt ansvarig
description:
Om Göteborgs Bildverkstad
  
Göteborgs Bildverkstad är en kreativ plattform för bildkonst. Vi erbjuder en teknikstark arbetsplats för olika former av bildskapande och för bildproduktion. Våra medlemmar är konstnärer, fotografer, filmare, illustratörer, serietecknare, animatörer, formgivare, arkitekter, bokförlag, kulturproducenter och gallerier.
  
Göteborgs Bildverkstad håller till vid Klippans kulturreservat. Vi har deltidsanställd personal på vår verkstad som stöttar medlemmar i sina produktioner.
  
Styrelsen ansvarar för långsiktig planering, medan personalen sköter den dagliga verksamheten. Personalens fokus är medlemmarnas behov, teknisk support och kurser. Personalen ansvarar också för föreningsadministration, löpande ekonomi, budgetering, bidragsansökningar, etc.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
Löpande hålla introduktioner för medlemmar i hur man använder verkstadens utrustning.
  
Ansvara för underhåll och service av arbetsstationer och utrustning.
  
Ansvara för inköp och hantering av tekniskt avancerad utrustning.
  
Planering av workshops och kurser inom bildproduktion för att hjälpa medlemmarna utveckla sina kunskaper och färdigheter.
  
Utveckla samarbeten med andra kreativa föreningar och organisationer för gemensamma projekt och evenemang.
  
Hålla bra och tydlig kommunikation med medlemmarna genom att dela lättförståelig information både online och i personliga samtal.
  
Sköta fakturering, bokföring, budgetering och budgetuppföljning samt ge administrativt stöd till verksamheten och styrelsen.
  
Bidragsansökningar för att möjliggöra projekt och utveckla verksamheten.
  
  

Kvalifikationer
  
Vi söker en serviceinriktad och initiativrik person som kan driva projekt självständigt och effektivt. Du kan förklara teknik och funktioner enkelt för personer med olika bakgrund och behov. Du är flexibel och lösningsfokuserad, strukturerad och har god organisationsförmåga. Som en del av ett samarbetsorienterat team är det viktigt att du har god samarbetsförmåga och är öppen för nya idéer. Samarbetsförmåga kommer att vara en avgörande faktor i urvalsprocessen.
  
Krav
  
Teknisk kunskap och skicklighet i olika printtekniker samt bred kunskap inom digital bildhantering.
  
God kunskap och erfarenhet av att hantera digital fotoutrustning.
  
Administrativ erfarenhet.
  
Erfarenhet av ekonomihantering såsom fakturahantering, bokföring och budgetering.
  
Goda språkkunskaper i både svenska och engelska samt lätt för att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift.
  
  

**Meriterande:**  

Erfarenhet av Epson storformatsskrivare, Hasselblad Flextight X1 filmskanner, Mac arbetsstationer, och/eller Epson flatbäddsskanners.
  
Erfarenhet av Canon EOS och/eller Blackmagic Cinema systemkameror.
  
Erfarenhet av Adobe Creative Cloud med särskild vikt vid Photoshop.
  
Erfarenhet av arbete med ekonomihantering i Visma Ekonomi.
  
Erfarenhet av självständigt arbete med administration i en liten organisation.
  
Pedagogisk erfarenhet och erfarenhet av support eller motsvarande.
  
  

Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet.
  
  

**Anställning:**  

**Anställningsform:** Vikariat
  
**Omfattning:** Deltid ca 50%
  
**Tillträde och tidsperiod:** 1 september eller enligt överenskommelse t.o.m. 31 augusti 2025, med ev. möjlighet till förlängning
  
Göteborgs Bildverkstad är kollektivavtalanslutna
  
  

Ansökan
  
Ansökan i PDF format med personligt brev (max 1 sida), CV (max 2 sidor) samt 1-2 referenser med kontaktuppgifter ska vara oss tillhanda senast 2024-08-25 per e-post till styrelsen@goteborgsbildverkstad.se.
  
Urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
  
  

Kontakt
  
  

**Frågor om tjänsten besvaras av:**  

Anna Sofia Jernryd, ordförande Göteborgs Bildverkstad
  
Sebastian Kok, kassör Göteborgs Bildverkstad
  
  

**E-post:** styrelsen@goteborgsbildverkstad.se

title: Senior CloudOps Engineer
description:
Vi söker dig som vill ta nästa steg i karriären som Sr CloudOps Engineer tillsammans med oss! I denna roll kommer du att vara avgörande för vår kunds säkerhetsinfrastruktur, med fokus på Azure och M365. Du kommer att hantera allt från avancerade säkerhetskonfigurationer med Azure Defender och Microsoft Sentinel, till komplex nätverkskonfiguration i både Azure VNet och AWS VPC.
  
**Ansvarsområden:** Säkerhetskonfiguration och hantering: Djupgående kunskap om Azure Defender-produkter, Microsoft Purview, Microsoft Sentinel samt säkerhetsfunktioner inom Azure och M365, inklusive hantering av EntraID Managed ID.
  
**Nätverkskonfiguration:** Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure Virtual Network (VNet) och motsvarande AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC).
  
**Molntjänster och serverlösa lösningar:** Implementering och administration av API management, Appservices, webservices, Azure Functions, Service Bus, Event Hub, Kubernetes, Key Vault secrets, och Public Key Infrastructure (PKI).
  
**Backup och katastrofåterställning:** Utforma och underhålla robusta backup-strategier samt disaster recovery-planer inklusive Recovery Point Objective (RPO), Recovery Time Objective (RTO), och Point-in-Time Recovery (PITR).
  
**Kvalifikationer:** Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom CloudOps eller liknande roller, med bevisad expertis i Azure och M365 säkerhetsfunktioner.
  
God förståelse för AWS-tjänster och nätverksarkitektur.
  
Erfarenhet av att arbeta med komplexa molnmiljöer och hybridlösningar.
  
Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och som del av ett team, med stark problemlösningsförmåga och analytiskt tänkande.
  
**Meriterande:** Certifieringar såsom Azure Solutions Architect, Azure Security Engineer, AWS Certified Solutions Architect eller liknande.
  
  

**Om CONSULTING it:**  

När du börjar hos oss som konsult på CONSULTING it blir du en del av vår gemenskap. Du får dessutom kollegor runt om i Sverige! Du har en dedikerad konsultchef som stöttar dig och din utveckling. Vi hjälper dig hitta nya vägar genom att prova på nya roller och nya branscher, för oss är det viktigt att du trivs på din arbetsplats. Vi ser till att du hamnar på ett bra bolag under ditt uppdrag och att uppdragen ligger i linje med hur du vill utvecklas framöver. Oavsett vad det blir, står vi bakom dig hela vägen – i ditt nästa, nästa och nästa steg. Gå med i vårt team och ta del av en spännande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö!

title: Cyber Security Engineer – Security Controls
description:
**Job Description**
 Cyber Security Controls team works to establish and implement security controls on tools and platforms used at H&M.
   

  

 Cyber Security Engineers implement the right security controls in software and services across the technological landscape to ensure confidentiality and integrity and increase overall security in platforms and tools.
   

  

 Cyber Security Engineers have competencies in one or more core tech domains, e.g. secure software development, cloud, network, key and encryption, and data protection. In this capacity, a cyber security engineer is part of the proactive work to help shape the security of tech delivery of H&M. In Security Controls, engineers with different competencies work together to support a wide array of technologies.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Take ownership of your technical stack, and design, build, test, and deploy security and compliance controls to enhance operational security.
* Develop processes and tools to support tech delivery teams.
* Define and develop security guardrails.
* Plan, implement, manage, monitor, and upgrade security measures to protect the organization's data, systems, and networks.
* Troubleshoot security and control issues.
* Ensure the organization's data and infrastructure are protected by implementing appropriate security controls.
* Participate in the change management process.
* Identify and implement automation opportunities, and support the design and implementation of automation solutions.
* Handle daily administrative tasks, reporting, and communication with relevant departments.


**Qualifications**
* You have hands-on experience in one or more technologies listed below :
+ Cloud services like Azure and Google Cloud (with focus on infrastructure security)
+ Cryptography (certificates, ADCS, Digicert, Certificates as a Service)
+ Implementing security Controls for Secure software development (all phases of SDLC)
+ Information and data protection, data privacy (with good understanding of privacy regulations)

* You have experience with systems such as Microsoft Defender, Sentinel, Pureview, email and domain security, and Office 365 Security.
* You are proactive, taking initiative to identify and address obstacles, issues, and opportunities.
* You have a strong curiosity and passion for technology, understanding how things work and how they are assembled.
* You enjoy acquiring new knowledge and learning new skills.
* You can prioritize projects and are comfortable working in a fast-paced environment, with excellent communication skills.
* You are a problem solver with strong analytical ability, creativity, and a focus on customer and business needs.
* You demonstrate commitment and ownership, with a keen attention to detail and accuracy.
* You are open to change and willing to ask questions when unsure.
* You excel as a team player, effectively communicating technical concepts to both peers and those with limited technical backgrounds, while contributing positively to the team environment.


**Additional Information**
 Please note that at this time, we are only able to support applications from candidates located in Sweden or the EU. Our hybrid working model requires individuals to be onsite at our Stockholm HQ three days a week. We are committed to creating an inclusive workspace and encourage applicants from diverse backgrounds within these regions to apply.

title: Junior Application Expert focused on Last Mile
description:
**Company Description**
 As one of the world’s largest fashion companies with more than 171,000 employees worldwide, H&M is an exciting and dynamic place to pursue a career within the fashion industry. H&M group comprises nine independent brands: H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M Home, & Other Stories, ARKET and Afound. We have over 5,000 stores across more than 73 markets worldwide.
   

  

 H&M Group is a dynamic organization committed to exceeding customer expectations through collaboration, innovation, and technology. Our tech organization caters to the unique needs of millions of customers, delivering end-to-end solutions for all our brands. As we accelerate digitalization, we seek strong leaders who can bring their best capabilities, innovative ideas, and talented technologists to support the transformative journey of H&M Group.
   

  

**Job Description**
 At H&M group – Business Tech, we are accelerating digitalization and to stay relevant, we need to ensure strong competences in place to improve our end-to-end supply chain & logistics processes for online and store. For our customers to receive goods at best price and speed, we are looking for a
 **Graduate** 
 to join us as
 **Junior Application Expert** 
 working within last mile at H&M. You would be part of the,
   

  

**Transport B2C product team**
 The Transport Business-to-Consumer is an agile product team responsible for
 *tech* 
 enabling parcels to be sent to customers in H&Ms online channel. We work with SaaS partners that connect H&M to last mile delivery companies across the globe. The team consists of ten people, in various roles, application experts, service owner & product manager.
   

  

**What We Do On a Day-to-day Basis**
 On a day-to-day basis we work in projects, some examples are, launching online sales in a new country, setting up a new warehouse or tech transformations such as digitalizing the return journey. In addition to projects, we are responsible for maintenance of the product where we drive smaller changes to support transport operations.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**What you would do:**
 Majority of your time would be spent working together with experienced team members in various projects. Every project is unique but typically consist of us gathering requirements, creating solution designs, aligning with our SaaS partners, testing and partaking in go-live activities.
   

  

 Some of your time will be spent working on maintenance activities which are of a less complex nature. Here you can work more independent and take support from the team as needed.
   

  

 As you grow your skills, learn about the application landscape and business process, you will be given more responsibility and possibility to develop and grow in areas that interest you.
   

  

**Qualification:**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, Information Systems or a related field
* Basic understanding of software development principles
* Basic understanding of e-commerce logistics
* Clear verbal and written communication skills
* Internships, personal projects, and relevant coursework can all be valuable in demonstrating your qualifications for this role


**Additional Information**
 This is a permanent full-time position open for location
 **Stockholm.**
 Application period is open till
 **31st** 
**of August** 
 .
   

  

 We are eager to meet you! :)
   

  

**Benefits At H&M**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

*We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.*

title: Security Engineer
description:
*You know that corporate document or piece of research you know you have somewhere but you can’t seem to find it?* 
 🤯
 *The struggle to gather, organize and visualize all corporate knowledge and insights is real.*
**We are Stravito and this is the problem we solve.**
 Due to the universal nature of this problem, our customers come from various industries all around the world. We help world-leading organizations, such as McDonald’s, AT&T, Burberry and Heineken, get closer to their customers and make better, insights-backed decisions by organizing their knowledge and making it easy to access through our intuitive platform.
   

  

 We really mean it when we say we're a diverse and international team as our team of 90 has more than 30 different nationalities! We are guided by our operating principles: simplicity first, an “own it, do it” mentality, embracing different perspectives, and enjoying the journey together.
   

  

**About The Job**
 As our first dedicated Security Engineer, you'll play a key role in ensuring the security of our platform. You will join a tech team with a great team environment and high quality standards, to go from good to great when it comes to security related topics. You will nurture a robust internal security community, evolving our bug bounty program, setting security standards for our production pipeline, and defining security measures for our GenAI features.
   

  

**Your Main Responsibilities Will Include**
* Finding and fixing code vulnerabilities
* Testing and improving security in our AI pipelines
* Support other engineers in secure coding practices
* Lead and mentor our Security functional group
* Manage our bug bounty program.


**About You**
 To succeed in this role you will need a solid understanding of software architecture and security, including compliance and regulations. We believe you have experience from back-end development, preferably in Java/Kotlin from working in a product company. You have extensive knowledge in AWS-specific security measures, as well as OWASP or similar frameworks. Certifications such as CSSLP or OSCP is a plus, as well as experience working with Python and TypeScript. With strong communication skills and a helpful approach, you effectively collaborate with a variety of stakeholders and team members. You have the ability to prioritize and advise in all things Security, both internally at Stravito and to our customers.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
 You will join a remote-first and globally spread team, with company events a couple of times each year as the icing on the cake 🎂 We offer a fun, collaborative environment where everyone truly cares and helps each other. We have zero micro-management and instead you are encouraged to cultivate your own processes while giving and receiving feedback for improvement. Add to that a competitive compensation package, the possibility of working with cutting-edge technology in our industry (such as GenAI) and to be part of simplifying the professional lives of many - what’s not to like?
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: GTM Associate/Manager
description:
**Come and do your life’s work** 




 Sana is here to change the way the world learns and become the industry leader in an unprecedented time. The Sana team consists of pragmatic dreamers from previous workplaces such as McKinsey, Spotify, Slack, and BCG. Together, we’re all on a quest to build an internet-scale library of Alexandria. We're always looking for bold and ambitious people to make all of this happen.
 



  





**Preferably you…** 



* Have around 3-4 years of successful B2B or SaaS sales experience
* Speak fluent English, and preferably one more European/Nordic language
* Hold a genuine passion for initiating conversations with multiple contacts in a wide range of organizations
* Possess entrepreneurial spirit and adaptability, alongside a relentless determination to deliver and achieve targets
* Are passionate about global go-to-market and deeply committed to continuous learning and development
* Have a humble and curious mind



  





**What we offer...** 



* Possibility to largely impact how people learn, across every industry, and across the globe
* Fast career development opportunity in a rapidly changing entrepreneurial environment
* Office on Östermalm, Stockholm
* Competitive, top-tier salary package
* Transparent and highly competitive option program
* Office-first culture with a highly collaborative team



  





 Don’t meet every single requirement? Apply anyway! Studies have shown that women and people of color are less likely to apply to jobs unless they meet every single qualification. At Sana, we want to built a diverse and inclusive workplace, so if you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we still want to hear from you.
 



  





 Think you’d be a great fit? We want to hear from you.
 



 https://sanalabs.com/careers

title: Principal Solution Architect (Nordics & Benelux)
description:
**Description**
 What makes us Qlik?
   

  

 A Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ Leader for 13 years, Qlik transforms complex data landscapes into actionable insights, driving strategic business outcomes.
   

  

 Serving over 40,000 global customers, our portfolio leverages pervasive data quality and advanced AI/ML capabilities that lead to faster and better decisions.
   

  

 We excel in integration and governance solutions that work with diverse data sources. Our real-time analytics uncover hidden patterns, empowering teams to address complex challenges and seize new opportunities.
   

  

 The Solution Architect Role
   

  

 Are you ready for a role with diverse responsibilities, constant excitement, and the opportunity to work closely with our largest regional customers and partners?
   

  

 As a Solutions Architect at Qlik, you'll be a key player in our Sales Organization, collaborating with various teams and staying at the forefront of the latest developments in the Data, Analytics, and AI market. If you thrive in a dynamic, agile work environment and are motivated by technical challenges, this position might be the perfect fit for you!
   

  

 What makes this role interesting?
   

  

* Take complete ownership of technical relationships and the sales cycle by effectively showcasing the technical and business value of Qlik's next-generation data analytics, ML/AI, and data integration platform to customers, partners, and internal teams.
* Engage with key customer stakeholders through exceptional solution presentations and custom demonstrations. Position proposed solutions to technical, end-users, operations, and senior management staff.
* Stay informed about Qlik's latest product developments and competitors in the Data, Analytics & AI market. Work closely with Sales, Marketing, Customer Success, Product, R&D, and Consulting teams.


**Here's How You'll Be Making An Impact**
* Technical Ownership: Demonstrate end-to-end ownership of technical relationships and the technical sales cycle.
* Sales Qualification: Contribute to the technical qualification and closure of sales opportunities, predominantly involving Qlik's Data Integration, Automated Machine Learning, and AI platform. Collaborate


 with colleagues to address customers' data integration and governance requirements utilizing Qlik Talend Data Integration solutions.
   

  

* Presales Activities: Engage in initiatives to boost regional revenue, delivering outstanding solution presentations and tailored demonstrations.
* Solution Positioning: Present potential solutions to stakeholders within the prospect's or Qlik partner's organization.
* Proof-of-Concept Execution: Execute Proof-of-Concepts successfully to demonstrate the value of Qlik's solutions to potential customers.
* Regional Business Development: Support regional business development activities, such as marketing events, trade shows, and partner events.
* Internal Enablement and Content Creation: Create valuable content for our team and across teams. This could include writing white papers, community articles, customer success stories, etc.


**We're Looking For a Teammate With The Following**
* 3-5 years of experience in a Presales, Consulting, or similar technical capacity
* Excellent communication skills to convince both business and technical audiences
* Highly driven with strong interpersonal skills. Proven track record of developing relationships at technical, commercial, and executive levels throughout large enterprises
* Experience in BI, data visualization, and analytics. Proficient with cloud solutions like SaaS, PaaS, and iPaaS.
* Strong knowledge of areas like Data Integration (ETL/ELT), Data Warehousing, APIs, Data Quality, and Data Governance
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple complex opportunities
* Previous experience with Data Integration products is a strong advantage.
* Proficient knowledge of web development technologies such as JavaScript, HTML5, .NET, and Python is beneficial.
* A solid understanding of Machine Learning tools and Generative AI concepts is advantageous.
* Expertise in Cloud technologies, including certifications for specific hyperscalers (AWS, Azure, GCP), is a plus.
* This position requires willingness and ability to travel.
* Fluent in one of the Nordic languages and English


 The location for this role is:
   

  

 The role is located in Stockholm.
   

  

**More About Qlik And Who We Are**
 Find out more about life at Qlik on social media: Instagram, LinkedIn, YouTube, and X/Twitter. To see all other opportunities to join us and learn about our values, check out our Careers Pag e.
   

  

 What else do we offer?
   

  

* Genuine career progression pathways and mentoring programs
* Culture of innovation, technology, collaboration, and openness
* Flexible, diverse, and international work environment


 Giving back is a massive part of our culture. Alongside an extra "change the world" day plus another for personal development, we also highly encourage participation in our Corporate Responsibility Employee Programs.
   

  

 If you need assistance applying for a role due to a disability, please email your request to accessibility @ qlik.com. Any information you provide will be treated according to Qlik's Recruitment Privacy Notice. Qlik may only respond to emails related to accommodation requests.
   

  

 Qlik is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Qlik via email, the Internet, or in any form and method without a valid written search agreement for this position will be deemed the sole property of Qlik. No fee will be paid if Qlik hires the candidate due to the referral or through other means.

title: Senior Account Manager
description:
*Välkommen till oss på AdNext, det snabbast växande bolaget inom annons-och mediebranschen. Bli en del av vår fortsatta tillväxtresa.* 




 Vi ser en ljus framtid och vill nu prata med dig om du är passionerad, driven och vill vara en del av vår resa mot att bli det främsta valet för företag runt om i Sverige.
 



  





**Om rollen:** 




 Du kommer att vara en del av ett drivet säljteam och rapportera till vår Chief Commercial Officer. Huvudmålet med rollen är att skapa nya affärer genom att kontakta nya potentiella kunder, genomföra möten och tillsammans med kunden sätta upp rätt plan för bästa exponering. Här är också möjligheten stor att senare avancera till Head of Sales.
 



  





**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:** 




 - Kontakta nya potentiella kunder via telefon, sms, e-post, sociala medier, evenemang, rekommendationer, offline-aktiviteter! Var kreativ!
 



 - Utbilda marknadsföringsteam genom möten om hur den moderna konsumentens beteende har förändrats och den resa en konsument går igenom innan ett köp.
 



 - Utbilda om AdNexts produkter och tjänster.
 



 - Motivera varför utvalda kunder bör investera en betydande budget i annonsering för att uppnå sina övergripande mål.
 



 - Följa upp potentiella kunder över tid.
 



 - Bidra till en fantastisk arbetskultur tillsammans med dina kollegor.
 



  





**Vi tror att du har:** 




 - Arbetat med annons-och mediaförsäljning i minst 3 år så att du förstår hur man skapar en försäljningsprocess.
 



 - Har affärsförståelse och snabbt kan greppa kundens verksamhet och vilka utmaningar de har.
 



 - Erfarenhet av att vinna förtroende från seniora positioner.
 



 - Du är självlärd och initiativrik.
 



  





**Vad vi erbjuder:** 




 - Möjlighet att bli partner genom vårt optionsprogram.
 



 - Konkurrenskraftig lön samt pensionsupplägg.
 



 - 5 veckors betald semester per år.
 



 - MacBook och iPhone.
 



 - Halvårsvis konferensresor (senast var vi i södra Frankrike).
 



 - Möjlighet att utveckla din förståelse och kunskap om marknadsföring och annonsering.
 



 - Arbeta med de senaste försäljnings- och marknadsföringsmetoderna inom strategisk försäljning.
 



 - Möjligheten att arbeta med starka varumärken och marknadsledande tekniska lösningar.
 



  





**Start:** 
 Så snart som möjligt (Heltid)
 



  





**Placering och rapportering** 
 : Du kommer att vara baserad i Stockholm, på vårt kontor på Sankt Eriksgatan 33 (Högst upp i byggnaden med 75km takterrass), som en del av vårt säljteam och rapportera till vår Chief Commercial Officer i Stockholm.
 



  





 Har du några frågor om rollen, karriärmöjligheter eller något annat? Hör av dig!
 



  





 https://www.adnext.se/senior-account-manager

title: Service Designer
description:
Are you prepared to lead the charge in transforming cities and empowering private parking operators within an entrepreneurial and international environment? At EasyPark, we're on a mission to make cities more liveable, and we want you to be a key player in this journey.
   

  

 As a Service Designer, you'll be an integral part of our
 **Corporation Experience Team** 
 whose mission is to deliver the most effortless & integrable parking SaaS for companies and employees, to be more cost efficient and productive and contribute to sustainable urban development.
   

  

 Our goal is to create a seamless B2B Ecosystem that empower companies in a scalable, cost-efficient, fast, and automated way. A growth product design mindset is essential in reaching our goal.
   

  

 Our design team, currently consisting of 19 members, also aspires to broaden EasyPark's offerings into new markets. This presents significant potential to improve user experience and contribute to substantial business impact.
   

  

 The broader Product&Tecnology organization includes a genuinely diverse and distributed team of over 450 talented specialists in product, engineering, design, and analytics; located across Stockholm, Amsterdam, Basingstoke, Tallinn, Atlanta and more.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a Service Designer at EasyPark, your main tasks involve collaborating cross-functionally to improve experiences for our B2B customers and also have a unique opportunity to shape how the service design competence is built and integrated within our organization. You'll work closely with both internal and external customers to gather insights. These insights will then be turned into clear customer journeys and design concepts for our products.
   

  

 You'll team up with other product designers, product managers, and developers to create new features and improve existing ones. This involves working on how information is organized, how users interact with our products.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Conduct customer discovery sessions to reveal insights, behaviors, and requirements.
* Play an active role in product discovery and take charge of the mitigation of usability risk.
* Collaborate closely with teams to harmonize services with user needs and corporate goals.
* Craft service blueprints, customer journeys, and user personas to guide product decisions.
* Generate, prototype, and refine new service concepts and solutions.
* Facilitate workshops and co-design sessions involving stakeholders and users.
* Ensure EasyPark's business goals match customer behaviors for exceptional experiences.
* Advocate for service design best practices and a user-centric approach and shape service design proficiency, influencing methodologies at EasyPark
* Analyze data to enhance products and evaluate service performance.


**Key Qualifications**
* You have 5+ years of experience in Service Design.
* Your strengths are in research, analysis and understanding processes.
* You can express complex ideas through flows and prototypes.
* Experience in collaborating within cross-functional teams, especially in a B2B/SaaS setting.
* You have experience in working with Agile development methods.
* You are proficient in designing workshops and facilitation skills to encourage collaboration and effective communication.
* You can work independently, planning and executing Discovery and conceptualisation projects with tangible results.


 This role is based in Stockholm.
   

  

**Life at EasyPark Group**
 We are a values-driven company with an international culture and a global presence. By providing an environment with space to grow and room for autonomy, we believe in encouraging and supporting our team members to take initiatives and act outside of their comfort zone. To have an open mind and embracing change is a part of our DNA. At EasyPark we are dedicated to maintaining an open culture where the voice of each person is heard, and we play as one team across the globe. Diversity is something we celebrate and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Flexible ways of working: combine working from home with working from the office, whatever is agreed on within your team.
* Digital global onboarding: three days to indulge in learning & connecting with fellow new starters across the globe.
* Pension, insurances & health reimbursement: A competitive pension, in combination with the basic package of insurances
* Proactive health support: your wellbeing is important to us, which is why we offer proactive medical support, all depending on your need.
* Mental well-being support via Blue Call
* Wellness reimbursement: 5000 SEK/year

title: Systemtekniker till Riksidrottsförbundet!
description:
Idrottsrörelsen är inne i en dynamisk förändringsprocess. Här drivs idrott i förening för att ha roligt, må bra och utvecklas hela livet och varje dag tar vi ännu ett steg på resan mot en mer nyfiken och välkomnande idrottsrörelse. IT-avdelningen ansvarar för att ge support till anställda och alla våra medlemsförbund samt förvaltar och utvecklar IT-miljön med fokus på säkerhet och tillgänglighet. Som System- och drifttekniker är du en viktig del i att säkerställa att idrottens medlemmar friktionsfritt kan arbeta med de digitala verktygen. Har du några års erfarenhet inom drift och är redo för nästa steg? Häng med på vår resa!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Sveriges Riksidrottsförbund
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, 100%
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Riksidrottsförbundet (RF) är idrottsrörelsens samlande organisation med uppgift att stödja, företräda, leda och samordna idrottsrörelsen i gemensamma frågor, såväl nationellt som internationellt.
